Title: Rozen's Secret 10
Content: Has seriously considered kidnapping Gray Raven's commandant to Cerberus and is looking for the opportunity to do so. The coverup afterward—plans for system file tampering and concealing the truth—has also been prudently prepared.

Title: Rozen's Secret 11
Content: Can only focus on one thing at a time. Will grow annoyed if you hand her more.

Title: Rozen's Secret 12
Content: Has imagined the scenario of Gray Raven's commandant being Cerberus' commandant. Did not tell anyone else about what she actually saw.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 1
Content: Dislikes being roused from sleep. Will be in a bad mood if done so.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 2
Content: Gamer god. Especially good at action games from the Golden Age.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 3
Content: Has no idea about how casual games like matching pairs work. Thinks that they are annoying and have no reason to exist.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 4
Content: Has a near photographic memory about traveling routes and image-related information.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 5
Content: Dislikes repairing and switching frames. Rejects all scheduled frame maintenance events.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 6
Content: Had his taste sensors especially enhanced. Broad-minded about different human delicacies, and is eager to try them.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 7
Content: Begins to doubt himself when his thoughts align with Kamui's.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 8
Content: Only conscious about 30% of the time when he is in Kamui's M.I.N.D. Sleeping in the rest of the 70%. Does not know all that Kamui sees or hears.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 9
Content: After coming to terms with Kamui, for almost every night daily, Kamui will tell him everything that's happened in the day.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 10
Content: Obstinately trusts his instincts and first impressions on people. Scientists like Asimov are of course a den of dangerous bastards, and the commandant of Gray Raven is "eh, alright" and worthy of trust, at least.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 11
Content: To everyone's surprise, Camu keeps his promises and is always punctual.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 12
Content: Will fall silent when he is in deep contemplation. Kamui has once said that an angry Camu is extremely terrifying.

Title: Rigor's Secret 1
Content: Her obsolete centaur module is officially named "Lindwyrm".

Title: Rigor's Secret 2
Content: Forest Guard members groom each other's hair. Rosetta's hairstyle was the result of a public voting.

Title: Rigor's Secret 3
Content: Likes animals, especially whales.

Title: Rigor's Secret 4
Content: Concerned about her frame weight. In weight measurement tests, she will stealthily activate her wings to cheat.

Title: Rigor's Secret 5
Content: Rosetta was once reluctant about being called a leader or captain, but eventually gave in.

Title: Rigor's Secret 6
Content: Not good with electronics and machines. According to Rosetta, however, she definitely knows how to use them, she merely dislikes them.

Title: Rigor's Secret 7
Content: Rosetta still believes that centaurs really existed.

Title: Rigor's Secret 8
Content: Rosetta finds it difficult to adapt to simulated gravity environments. She usually avoids going near portholes that can see the outer space.

Title: Rigor's Secret 9
Content: To be battle-ready at all times, Rosetta sleeps standing and levitating.

Title: Rigor's Secret 10
Content: Babylonia has equipped Rosetta with a spear and a shield according to her usage habits. Rosetta, however, actually has no weapon preferences and can use any weapons effectively for battle.

Title: Rigor's Secret 11
Content: Has childish interests such as dodge ball, card games, watching animations, and so on.

Title: Rigor's Secret 12
Content: After meeting the commandant, Rosetta has been feeling like the unlucky incidents are becoming few and far between.

Title: Pavo's Secret 1
Content: Very rarely calls herself the Kowloong Monarch unless necessary.

Title: Pavo's Secret 2
Content: Enjoys reading human books during her leisure time, particularly on anthropology and history topics.

Title: Pavo's Secret 3
Content: Understands and agrees that propaganda is necessary, but still cringes when she sees her own image being printed on promotional materials.

Title: Pavo's Secret 4
Content: Felt relaxed for a very brief moment after disappearing, but soon denied this emotion. She knew she had to keep working on Tabula Akasha in secret.

Title: Pavo's Secret 5
Content: It's always lonely at the top. But Qu does not mind.

Title: Pavo's Secret 6
Content: Strictly follows her daily routine.

Title: Pavo's Secret 7
Content: Felt taking care of her own long hair was a lot of hassle, so decided to just wear it down.

Title: Pavo's Secret 8
Content: Once thought about asking Huiyu to comb her hair, but gave up in the end.

Title: Pavo's Secret 9
Content: Once blamed herself for a long time after lying on a soft lounge for 3 minutes, then ordered to destroy all soft-texture furniture within KCC.

Title: Pavo's Secret 10
Content: Is an advocate of science, but can be quite traditional when it comes to some personal matters.

Title: Pavo's Secret 11
Content: Found many undiscovered planets on the Observatory, and named them after the people around her.

Title: Pavo's Secret 12
Content: One of them was named after the commandant.

Title: Qilin's Secret 1
Content: Cares a lot about his own good, almost to the extent of being greedy, but knows his boundaries well and will not do the wrong thing for profit. The "profit" here is not limited to monetary terms, as Changyu also sees relationship with others as important asset.

Title: Qilin's Secret 2
Content: Likes to address those older than him as uncle or auntie, but only out of respect. Immediately changes if told not to do so.

Title: Qilin's Secret 3
Content: Hates waste, so he dislikes those tycoons who easily throw things away and tries to avoid dealing with them. Thinks Jamilah is a good merchant as she makes maximum use of her goods.

Title: Qilin's Secret 4
Content: Actually quite bothered by the fact that Constructs can never grow taller again naturally.

Title: Qilin's Secret 5
Content: Can be a little laid-back, but always makes sure his duties are completed.

Title: Qilin's Secret 6
Content: Is a great Kowloong cook and enjoys cooking for others. His dishes taste good, but often look horrible as he cannot be bothered to improve their aesthetics.

Title: Qilin's Secret 7
Content: Has 48 secret bases located in ruins or cabin warehouses. Keeps his "goodies" in these bases to prepare for unforeseen situations.

Title: Qilin's Secret 8
Content: Never easily makes a promise. Always tries to get away or decline the things that he is not willing to do.

Title: Qilin's Secret 9
Content: When he was a kid, he dreamed of becoming a hero in the drama to protect everyone.

Title: Qilin's Secret 10
Content: Is great at playing traditional games like mahjong. Can tell a card by touching its surface pattern, and sort the tiles to his liking using some technique.

Title: Qilin's Secret 11
Content: Apart from playing cards, Changyu has also learned many performing tricks during his leisure time. Often makes good use of these tricks in his missions.

Title: Qilin's Secret 12
Content: Uses his tail mostly for grabbing and maintaining balance, but can also use it as a weapon occasionally. He would make a sudden turn to "accidentally" tangle the opponent's legs with the tail, then attack again when bowing down to apologize. This move rarely misses on the first encounter.

Title: Laurel's Secret 1
Content: Under her sister's influence, she adores wearing stylish trinkets from time to time.

Title: Laurel's Secret 2
Content: Technically, the external attachment to this coating is entirely made of Punishing Virus Heteromers.

Title: Laurel's Secret 3
Content: Luna would rather be attacked than have her body smeared with dirt.

Title: Laurel's Secret 4
Content: Luna enjoys the feeling of weightlessness and near-perfect cleanliness in space.

Title: Laurel's Secret 5
Content: Because of her levitation, Luna's hair is frequently tangled and requires a lot of grooming.

Title: Laurel's Secret 6
Content: Luna has been afraid of hot meals since she was a child. Although Construct is unlikely to get burned, she cannot seem to break her habit of blowing on hot food before eating.

Title: Laurel's Secret 7
Content: She knows very little about the general knowledge because her daily activities are taken care of by her sister or Roland.

Title: Laurel's Secret 8
Content: She likes reading old paper books, although she prefers graphical books with less words.

Title: Laurel's Secret 9
Content: Luna loathes being looked down upon, so she will vary the height of her levitation according on the one she is speaking with.

Title: Laurel's Secret 10
Content: Luna tried to talk to the Corrupted, but they could only follow orders, not answer questions.

Title: Laurel's Secret 11
Content: Luna realized that not all snow is tainted with blood and grime after seeing pristine snow for the first time in the polar area.

Title: Laurel's Secret 12
Content: Lucia made up all sorts of stories about ghosts appearing from the shadows to keep Luna from being alone in the dark. Luna is still terrified of the dark because of this.

Title: 2B's Secret 1
Content: Everything that lives is designed to end. We are perpetually trapped in a never ending spiral of life and death. Is this a curse? Or some kind of punishment? I often think about the god who blessed us with this cryptic puzzle… and wonder if we’ll ever get the chance to kill him.

Title: 2B's Secret 2
Content: How long can I fight amidst this bloody vortex of a battle field? How long, I wonder?

Title: 2B's Secret 3
Content: How long can I continue to protect what I love amidst this endless war? How long, I wonder?

Title: 2B's Secret 4
Content: How long can I continue to believe in a world laden with deceit and folly? How long, I wonder?

Title: 2B's Secret 5
Content: How long can I lie to myself as I despair at the dark future of this world? How long, I wonder?

Title: 9S's Secret 1
Content:
"Once, long ago, a volcano erupted. From the fires of the eruption, a god emerged.
One day, the god appeared before the machines and said:
Consciousness, pain, joy, misery...
Fury, shame, desolation, the future...
The meaning of life."

Title: 9S's Secret 2
Content: Each of the machines treated their treasures with great care. One treasured family above all else. Another treasured its older sibling. Another treasured its own beauty. But one more machine treasured something unique above all else…

Title: 9S's Secret 3
Content:
"After a long period of battles and adventures, the prophet spoke.
O grant me the mercy of the land!
O grant me the joy of the heavens!
Release me from my yoke of iron!…… Thus shall our souls be saved.
Forever and ever."

Title: 9S's Secret 4
Content:
[TOP SECRET] [Project 02-01 Establishment of the YoRHa Squadron]
Through the dramatic alteration of the Next Generation Combat Unit Project that had been proposed at the time, new "YoRHa" models began to be manufactured.
Officials models were created following the implementation of data acquired from an experimental squadron, and were then deployed to all regions.
Certain members of the YoRHa operations staff, however, were informed of the full scope of the project—these units were tasked to operate and protect the server on the moon.

Title: 9S's Secret 5
Content:
[TOP SECRET] The following materials document the final stages of the YoRHa project.
(Note that this information is classified as Level-SS, meaning that it must not be disclosed to anyone involved in the YoRHa project, including the Commander of the Bunker.)
[Project 03-01 Disposal of YoRHa]
The backdoor of the Bunker has been set to open once the time approaches to switch to new models when enough combat data has been collected.
The Bunker will be disposed of by having it be deliberately attacked by machines.
At this time, all materials regarding the YoRHa project, including this document, will be lost, and falsification of the information that ████████████ will be complete.

Title: A2's Secret 1
Content: Unit from the experimental YoRHa squadron that was programmed to have a neutral personality. Attacker Number 2 took command of the squadron after the death of its original captain, Number 1.

Title: A2's Secret 2
Content: Despite issuing many questionable commands during her initial time in a leadership role, she eventually formed a working relationship with the Resistance and succeeded in destroying the enemy server. While the experimental YoRHa unit Number 2 possessed great growth and adaptability abilities, she also deserted her post following the destruction of the server—and as of this moment, she has yet to be apprehended.

Title: A2's Secret 3
Content: [TOP SECRET] [Project 08-01: Operation of Model No.2 in the YoRHa Project]\nAfter the first descent of the YoRHa prototypes, Attacker 2 (A2) was the sole unit to return alive, despite mediocre results during her simulations. Upon analysis of her stored personality data, it was discovered she possesses excellent analytical and decision-making skills in extreme circumstances.\nAs reported separately, we will install this personality data in the new lot of E models and use them for the security protection of this project.

Title: A2's Secret 4
Content: While the destruction of the server struck a blow against enemy forces, the true purpose of this operator was to monitor and research how the experimental YoRHa models behaved during battle. This information would then be studied and integrated into new YoRHa models once the project were to proceed past the experimental phase. — [Pearl Harbor Descent Summary]

Title: A2's Secret 5
Content: One note of concern: it has been verified that the black box signal of the experimental unit Attacker Number 2 remains live. Due to the possibility of the unit being captured and compromised by the enemy, and due to the unit's existence itself being a matter of the highest level of confidentiality, it has been decided that it is to be recovered—or disposed of—by the Type █ division once that group is fully operational. — [Pearl Harbor Descent Summary]

Title: Hypnos' Secret 1
Content: Really hopes he can sleep 25 hours a day.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 2
Content: Doesn't realize it, but often gets serious during the 1-on-1 training with Chrome. He can't tell how much of it is to tease the poker-faced Captain though.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 3
Content: Somehow, his artificial hair is always curly. No matter how much he tries to comb it, it will go back to the messy curls within a day.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 4
Content: Carries all sorts of random, non-battle-related widgets with him, including but not limited to candies, coins, eye mask, etc.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 5
Content: Wanshi seldom gets into trouble with others, for he can direct the conflict away before it ends up in violence — except when facing Shorthalt from the Scarab Squad.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 6
Content: Wrote "Do not disturb" on the eye mask himself.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 7
Content: Hates to leave the Strike Hawk lounge in winter. Once went to a mission with his own maintenance capsule.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 8
Content: Asked Chrome multiple times for permission to enter hibernation, but was always rejected.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 9
Content: Very good at keeping secrets because failing to do so may make the situation more troublesome.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 10
Content: Which makes Wanshi a very trustworthy friend. People love sharing their stories with him.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 11
Content: Keeps a surstromming can from the Golden Age in his private storage. It has never been opened.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 12
Content: Constructs have great hearing, and it keeps Wanshi from staying asleep. But nothing can wake him up if the commandant is around.

Title: Tempest's Secret 1
Content: Proficient in multiple languages in order to recreate operas in their most classic form.

Title: Tempest's Secret 2
Content: While Ayla and her are both artists, she prefers more classic performance over Ayla's modern style. This often leads to "friendly" arguments.

Title: Tempest's Secret 3
Content: Unlike what most would have imagined, most of those arguments end up with Ayla giving in.

Title: Tempest's Secret 4
Content: Has mastered all classical instruments and can easily replace a symphony orchestra by herself. She's been challenging metal rock recently, and is interested in drums in particular.

Title: Tempest's Secret 5
Content: As an opera singer, Selena has great talent in both music and literature. Often writes sequels for classic works, but keeps them strictly to herself.

Title: Tempest's Secret 6
Content: She's a textbook classic and traditional lady with elegant manners. However, her imagination can be vibrant and wild, and she can easily get lost in thoughts in any occasion.

Title: Tempest's Secret 7
Content: Has a great voice and often likes to hum, but gets very embarrassed if others find her humming or mumbling to herself.

Title: Tempest's Secret 8
Content: Is very sensitive to sound and can tell who is around even with eyes closed. Ayla in particular.

Title: Tempest's Secret 9
Content: Has a habit of writing letters and can write beautiful cursive letters. Keeps a long-time pen pal whose identity is still unknown.

Title: Tempest's Secret 10
Content: Is also a great dancer. Can even master men's lead steps.

Title: Tempest's Secret 11
Content: Is very fond of flowers but doesn't keep them herself, for everything she tries to grow will end up withering.

Title: Tempest's Secret 12
Content: Is considered to be naive in some ways, as she can openly and seriously say extremely embarrassing words while being total unaware of them. In fact, she doesn't think there is any problem at all.

Title: Glory's Secret 1
Content: Has chosen to use a weapon that accommodates the flexibility and mobility of his frame. Such weapons are extremely difficult to use, but he is very good at them.

Title: Glory's Secret 2
Content: Sometimes ignores the outside world when he spends too long lost in thought.

Title: Glory's Secret 3
Content: Has once prepared backup plans all the way from A to N.

Title: Glory's Secret 4
Content: Starts to notice things that are "outside the rules" more than he used to.

Title: Glory's Secret 5
Content: Still subconsciously tries to shoulder all problems and emergencies on himself, but is learning to seek opinions and help from those he can trust.

Title: Glory's Secret 6
Content: The "ear studs" are actually radar-amplifying devices. Was a bit concerned with their design in the beginning, but eventually decided to keep them after someone praised them greatly.

Title: Glory's Secret 7
Content: Has more faith in his team than in others, and prefers to let them grow instead of coaching them. Often worries about Kamui's recklessness, but also understands that Kamui has his reasons and guidelines.

Title: Glory's Secret 8
Content: Is sometimes worried that his preaching may have a negative effect on team members. Once told Kamui about his concern, but only got more baffled after Kamui burst into laughter.

Title: Glory's Secret 9
Content: Apart from reading, he also enjoys other hobbies in leisure time like chess. Unfortunately, nobody in his squad could play with him, so he brought an electronic chess board and knocked on the Gray Raven Commandant's lounge one day after mission.

Title: Glory's Secret 10
Content: Has ever only lost to two people in chess.

Title: Glory's Secret 11
Content: Reads through the comments when browsing books in the database. Out of habit, he would remember those with similar opinions as himself, and pay extra attention to their reading preferences later on.

Title: Glory's Secret 12
Content: Has set a special ringtone for the special comms channel with the commandant of Gray Raven.

Title: XXI's Secret 1
Content: Treats the Co-Bot as a companion and likes to give it surprisingly cute or ridiculous nicknames.

Title: XXI's Secret 2
Content: She's curious and likes to get to the bottom of any matter she doesn't understand. She always asks embarrassing and difficult questions.

Title: XXI's Secret 3
Content: She can't help imitating the people she trusts and learning their way of life. Sometimes, she even learns some peculiar behaviors.

Title: XXI's Secret 4
Content: She doesn't know how to smile, which can only be described as unsettling. After a couple of ill-timed smiles that had adverse effects, she decided that smiling was beyond comprehension, and she has seldom smiled from then on out.

Title: XXI's Secret 5
Content: She's an airhead when it comes to engineering and is incapable of understanding mechanical structures. Machines she tinkers with tend to have a lot of extra parts, but surprisingly most of them work.

Title: XXI's Secret 6
Content: In standby mode, she'll ask others to give her some small missions to kill time. Generally, she's only assigned to menial tasks, not realize she's being fooled.

Title: XXI's Secret 7
Content: She always labels people she cares about with colors and sometimes directly calls others "red man," "blue guy," etc. No one understands her criteria, but she appears to be the only one without a color.

Title: XXI's Secret 8
Content: After unwittingly coming into contact with the audio-visual terminal, she indulges in watching random video clips in her spare time. She has a proclivity for nature documentaries.

Title: XXI's Secret 9
Content: Because of her experience in the lab, she retains the habit of recording data on the condition of her frame all the time, even though it is no longer necessary. At the suggestion of the Gray Raven Commandant, she has started to record things other than battles, such as colors seen, favorite smells... until Vera found a foul-smelling scrapbook in Cerberus's break room.

Title: XXI's Secret 10
Content: The activation date of her frame is unknown due to a loss of data while being recycled by Kurono. The current date was assigned to her by some human.

Title: XXI's Secret 11
Content: The Gray Raven Commandant is the only person authorized to give Buddy nicknames.

Title: XXI's Secret 12
Content: Her distorted perception of her life as an "experiment" is gradually changing with the efforts of the people around her. Recently, it seems that she can take this problem more or less seriously.

Title: Garnet's Secret 1
Content: Vera has tied her hair up after changing into the new frame. Some say she does not want the long hair to obstruct her vision while attacking.

Title: Garnet's Secret 2
Content: Many prefer spears because they can attack from a relatively safe distance, but Vera seems to enjoy charging with hers actively to maximize the destructive power.

Title: Garnet's Secret 3
Content: Knowing that Murray was only the nominal commandant of Cerberus, Vera still tried to investigate his background to find if he had any possible secrets. She found nothing unfortunately.

Title: Garnet's Secret 4
Content: No. 21 seems to think of Vera's banner spear as some sort of "magic prop" that can create a banner out of nowhere. She often asks Vera to show it to her.

Title: Garnet's Secret 5
Content: Vera often utilizes various shady means to get some supplies and parts that are not available through normal sources for No. 21 and Noctis. She seems to think that they do not know about it, but both of them just continue to tacitly play dumb.

Title: Garnet's Secret 6
Content: The strength control of this frame is more difficult to master than others. Even Vera was crushing her mugs when she first changed into it. Strangely, everyone just thought she was doing it on purpose to intimidate them.

Title: Garnet's Secret 7
Content: According to No. 21's observation, at least 36% of Construct soldiers believed Vera "no longer looks as intimidating as before" after changing into her new frame.

Title: Garnet's Secret 8
Content: Vera likes to keep the most troublesome tasks to the end. Similarly, she keeps the most difficult enemies to enjoy last.

Title: Garnet's Secret 9
Content: Vera used to greet those who dared to seek trouble with violence. After warned by Nikola multiple times, she now prefers to destroy their ego with words first, and takes joy from their humiliated, furious faces.

Title: Garnet's Secret 10
Content: Vera mentions that she has yet to master the banner spear completely, and therefore has included more flexible kicks to complement her moves. In fact, they have raised both the practicality and aesthetics of this weapon to another level.

Title: Garnet's Secret 11
Content: Vera sometimes goes to watch the stage plays performed by WGAA, but only quietly stays in an alienated corner until the end. She would disappear before the audience finishes their cheering and applause.

Title: Garnet's Secret 12
Content: Vera never asked, but No. 21 and Noctis often brought back news about the Gray Raven Commandant, possibly because their captain "seemed to be interested."

Title: Flambeau's Secret 1
Content: He can speak a lot of different languages but not fluently, only some specific words and proverbs. However, he would sometimes throw out words people don't understand on purpose to rile them up and see how they react.

Title: Flambeau's Secret 2
Content: He is focused on the mission and can carry out mission relentlessly for 24 hours without rest. Even though this usually overworks his frame, his M.I.N.D. is already used to this feeling.

Title: Flambeau's Secret 3
Content: Proficient in popular culture, from music to visual arts and games, Roland can hold his own in a conversation with experts in those categories. Though he appears to be indifferent about these cultures.

Title: Flambeau's Secret 4
Content: Cultured in literature and plays of the old and present. If you ask him what's his favorite work, he will give you a different answer every day, but "His Own Life" will forever remain the work he detests the most.

Title: Flambeau's Secret 5
Content: Contrary to popular belief, Roland possesses common sense. He can easily find the flaws in others' logic and criticize them. Even the most perfect people would be left questioning themselves after his verbal assault. He refers to this as finding fault just for the sake of it.

Title: Flambeau's Secret 6
Content: His words always have other meanings underneath, but if the other party really cannot pick up on the true meanings, he treats them like children, giving them candy, making funny faces, and even performing magic tricks to amuse them.

Title: Flambeau's Secret 7
Content: He has complicated feelings toward "family." He gets destructive when he sees scenes such as family reunions, but he doesn't always act on these emotions, there are times that he actually sends his blessings as well.

Title: Flambeau's Secret 8
Content: Being an actor once, he is skilled at smiling. He can retain his smile in different situations while expressing numerous other emotions. No one knows his true feelings when he slips on his mask of a smile.

Title: Flambeau's Secret 9
Content: He cares about his appearance, and everything he wears has been "elaborately planned," but his fashion senses are somewhat different from normal people's. If required, he is very willing to help others dress.

Title: Flambeau's Secret 10
Content: A method actor who has mastered the skill to talk to "himself." He is always found talking to himself even with others around, making it hard for others to know for sure if he's making fun of them or just engrossed in his conversation with himself.

Title: Flambeau's Secret 11
Content: He can call out up to 6 different periods of himself in his M.I.N.D. for a "roundtable discussion" to decide on the next step of action if needed. Codenames for these Rolands are R, O, L, A, N, and D, respectively—at least, this is what he claims.

Title: Flambeau's Secret 12
Content: He is skilled in arts and crafts, and his real hobby is making hand puppets and plush toys. One may be able to catch a glimpse of his true self from these furry little actors he makes. However, it has been quite some time since he last indulged in this hobby of his.

Title: Empyrea's Secret 1
Content: As the patients in the Star of Life do not know Liv's name, they privately call her "Angel", and Liv is completely unaware of that.

Title: Empyrea's Secret 2
Content: Liv is grateful to have Empyrea as she feels like she finally has the strength to change everything. Regrettably, Liv is unable to save more lives since she is not able to use the frame for too long.

Title: Empyrea's Secret 3
Content: Beneath her gentleness, Liv is actually enduring the side effects caused by M.I.N.D. overload and corruption. She never tells anyone of the sufferings, pains, and partings she experiences in her M.I.N.D.

Title: Empyrea's Secret 4
Content: Empyrea's initial hover height is a bit higher than Luminance's, which occasionally makes Liv feel dizzy. Therefore, when she is on standby, she lowers the hover height as much as she can.

Title: Empyrea's Secret 5
Content: After switching her frame, Liv seems to gain the ability to draw in small animals, especially birds.

Title: Empyrea's Secret 6
Content: Liv thinks about life after the war from time to time. She pictures all her cherished friends and companions having a fulfilling future. However, that future rarely has her in it.

Title: Empyrea's Secret 7
Content: Because of its Omega Weapon, Empyrea has a slightly higher temperature than all of Liv's previous frames. This is why it is more noticeable when Liv's cheeks blush.

Title: Empyrea's Secret 8
Content: Before her last mission, Liv sent her sheep plushie that she used to sleep with in the maintenance chamber to a youth development center.

Title: Empyrea's Secret 9
Content: Liv was once a helper at a greenhouse in Babylonia. When talking with the staff there, she would unintentionally bring up the nicknames she had given to the plants. She remembers all the names and growth states of the plants she took care of, just like she remembers everyone she has helped in the past.

Title: Empyrea's Secret 10
Content: Flower shop owner, forest ranger... Liv talked to Commandant about her childhood dreams from time to time after going back to Babylonia. Now as a Construct, she has saved the innocent, protected the conservation zones for humanity, and become a symbol of hope for everyone... "You've realized your childhood dreams another way," said her dearest commandant.

Title: Empyrea's Secret 11
Content: Liv always reminds herself not to turn her back to Commandant as she feels embarrassed about it.

Title: Empyrea's Secret 12
Content: The sentence that appears most frequently in the paper queen of the night is "Commandant was still asleep today."

Title: Capriccio's Secret 1
Content: Apart from mastering existing languages, she has also tried to create her own and sing it in certain arias. Such melodies often contain more emotions.

Title: Capriccio's Secret 2
Content: The constructed language has also appeared in the draft scripts of some of her operas, but she always digresses when asked about them.

Title: Capriccio's Secret 3
Content: Often writes a few phrases on the side of the letters to her pen-pal using her constructed language. When connected together, they would form a passionate poem.

Title: Capriccio's Secret 4
Content: Loves keeping paper records. Every once in a while, she would pick one or two of her etudes and transcribe them on paper to keep, but she seldom looks at them again out of shyness.

Title: Capriccio's Secret 5
Content: Inherited the love of opera from her father, but decided to become an opera singer because of the advice given by a senior in her childhood.

Title: Capriccio's Secret 6
Content: Believes the expression of emotions is not wrong and should be encouraged. Has also tried some bold ways of expression, but never manages to stick to them for long.

Title: Capriccio's Secret 7
Content: Has almost never been exposed to the ethnic instruments of Kowloong. Suona was the first one she came into contact with, but she gave up trying to include it in classical musicals after playing it.

Title: Capriccio's Secret 8
Content: The most heated "peaceful argument" she had with Ayla was centered around how to integrate suona into hard rock.

Title: Capriccio's Secret 9
Content: Is able to express her emotions through her voice or playing instruments during performances, but gets extremely embarrassed when someone sees her practicing in private.

Title: Capriccio's Secret 10
Content: The secrets here were entered in Capriccio's frame by Ayla after she visited those who knew Selena.

Title: Capriccio's Secret 11
Content: Most of the secrets here came from the mysterious pen-pal of Selena.

Title: Capriccio's Secret 12
Content: None of the secrets here is a fantasy or illusion.

Title: Dragontoll's Secret 1
Content: Although she always brings a scroll to keep notes, there are only doodles left on it after Kowloong Crew meetings.

Title: Dragontoll's Secret 2
Content: Although Pulao thinks the Little League of Changyu, Sophia, and Nanami is too childish, she craves friends of her age and often joins them unconsciously.

Title: Dragontoll's Secret 3
Content: The Pulao Crew is the protector of those on the Nighter and the enemy of the villains. All bad guys would be scared to death even upon seeing her little figure. She seems to have been affected by an anime series and always appears under the moonlight, but she doesn't remember why she does so.

Title: Dragontoll's Secret 4
Content: Due to the dance training she received, Pulao always bends her joints to loosen up, sometimes even to astonishing angles.

Title: Dragontoll's Secret 5
Content: Pulao is very concerned about her height. She even considered adding a pair of heels twice as high as her current ones to the frame but eventually scratched that idea due to the lack of balance.

Title: Dragontoll's Secret 6
Content: However, she's even more concerned about her grip strength than her height...

Title: Dragontoll's Secret 7
Content: She prides herself as the "caring big sister," and even the Kowloong Crew members have been more or less taken care of by her.

Title: Dragontoll's Secret 8
Content: What Pulao is wearing is a costume she had before joining the Kowloong Crew. She modified the costume and had a Kowloong Crew mechanoid named "Uno" write the character on her back.

Title: Dragontoll's Secret 9
Content: Pulao is obsessed with doing business and often consults Chiwen about how the market is doing, but her lack of business acumen always makes her lose everything she invested.

Title: Dragontoll's Secret 10
Content: Pulao bought a vintage stuffed panda from the vintage market on the Nighter. It somehow gives her a warm and nostalgic feeling.

Title: Dragontoll's Secret 11
Content: Unlike other Kowloong Crew members, she refuses to wear a mask. Maybe because she wants her beloved ones to recognize her if they can meet again one day in the future.

Title: Dragontoll's Secret 12
Content: Pulao often requires herself to act like a "grown-up," but sometimes she seems to unconsciously reveal the child aspect of her when she is with the Babylonia commandant.

Title: Starfarer's Secret 1
Content: Nanami has planned a large number of adornments for her new frame, but because she has to travel in the data ocean, she made adjustments after Gestalt said they "take up valuable processing power."

Title: Starfarer's Secret 2
Content: The "Three Laws of Nanami"—First Law: Nanami loves humans! So, no one is allowed to hurt humans.

Title: Starfarer's Secret 3
Content: Her frame gives her even more mobility—you can expect to find her snooping around all kinds of nooks and corners, air ducts, cardboard boxes, and undeployed machines...

Title: Starfarer's Secret 4
Content: Nanami loves to test the limit of Power's strength. Knowing that, the Engineering Force often challenges Nanami to get Power to cut materials that are normally hard to obtain.

Title: Starfarer's Secret 5
Content: Nanami loves the elevated view she gets on top of Power, but sometimes she will get too excited and forget Babylonia's height limit, hitting her head.

Title: Starfarer's Secret 6
Content: The "Three Laws of Nanami"—Second Law: Nanami is free, so Nanami does not follow orders she doesn't like! Even if it is fate itself!

Title: Starfarer's Secret 7
Content: System Announcement: Nanami is holding a contest for "Power's Perfect Pose", so don't forget to take a photo of them when you see them pass by! Sign up at the Gray Raven Commandant's room.

Title: Starfarer's Secret 8
Content: Nanami and Power's thoughts are linked. With just a thought, she can send Power into battle without being in the cockpit—at the expense of accuracy.

Title: Starfarer's Secret 9
Content: Power's full name is "Paradigmatic Omnipotent Weapon-Edge Remake".

Title: Starfarer's Secret 10
Content: Power's design is based on the shape of robotic soldiers in one of the possible futures, enhanced with armaments inspired by mechs in Golden Age anime.

Title: Starfarer's Secret 11
Content: The "Three Laws of Nanami"—Third Law: Nanami must live to find the only correct answer! That is how she can stay with her beloved friends.

Title: Starfarer's Secret 12
Content: The "Three Laws of Nanami"—Zeroth Law: Perhaps Commandant has to choose a future without Nanami one day. Still, Nanami will continue to love humans and Commandant. This is her promise to herself.

Title: Starveil's Secret 1
Content: According to Haicma's calculations, the fastest runner in human history is Kuafu whose speed exceeds 1,668km/h in order to see the sun 24 hours a day.

Title: Starveil's Secret 2
Content: Back in the early days when she was free from control, Haicma was struggling to distinguish between human legends and historical facts. As a result, it often appeared to her that mankind had experienced a significant physical decline, such as a loss of the ability to shoot fireballs from their palms.

Title: Starveil's Secret 3
Content: Haicma knows a technique called "divination" in which humans foretell the future with card arrangements; however, even with all of her computing power, she cannot prove its validity.

Title: Starveil's Secret 4
Content: Haicma's old-fashioned hat was originally worn to cover up a damaged component, but she decided to keep it even after the component was mended. It has become her routine to clean and repair this hat, and the reason for it is that a gear covering her head makes her feel "secure." She values the emotional connection brought by a particular item more than its necessity.

Title: Starveil's Secret 5
Content: Haicma excels in making puns, and she will explain her puns whenever necessary. The statement "excels in making puns" is based on the fact that she has a success rate of 89% in making her listeners laugh, which is truly impressive even though more than 50% of successful cases are not due to the pun itself.

Title: Starveil's Secret 6
Content: Haicma's composed exterior can be deceiving at times because she can maintain an impassive expression even when a storm is raging in her mind.

Title: Starveil's Secret 7
Content: Haicma's thinking is the result of precise calculations. Therefore, she often feels perplexed when a situation exceeds her expectations, but this is not a kind of feeling she hates.

Title: Starveil's Secret 8
Content: At first, Haicma wielded her scythe strictly adhering to the tactical movements in her database that include many subtleties like the angles and amount of force applied; yet, she soon discovered that adding certain variations to the tactical movements could increase combat efficiency by nearly 20%... It took a long time before she recovered from such an astonishment.

Title: Starveil's Secret 9
Content: Haicma's database contains a wealth of information on domestic services, which theoretically qualifies her as an expert in child care. But when it comes to real life, she has failed a lot due to her over-reliance on those theories.

Title: Starveil's Secret 10
Content: Haicma once stood motionless in the middle of a road for an entire day just because she did not want to disturb a bird that had landed on her head.

Title: Starveil's Secret 11
Content: In addition to imitating human sleep, Haicma also tried to kick a drink can the way humans did, and the can ended up going straight through a rusty trash bin.

Title: Starveil's Secret 12
Content: Haicma's frame was prepared by a researcher. Because she obtained this frame without knowing it at all, she has yet to fully understand its every function. For example, she just discovered that she can pull a never-ending string of colorful flags out from the joints of her arms.

Title: Scire's Secret 1
Content: At the beginning of the modification, she didn't expect Kurono would accept all her outrageous demands. And as a result, the backup plan she prepared was never used.

Title: Scire's Secret 2
Content: The only design proposal rejected was the one created based on her personal preference—an Inver-Device that is twice as large as the current one. The argument was settled with Karenina's compromise, after the person showed her a scenario where the wearer had to crouch down to pass through the doorway after installing the Inver-Device.

Title: Scire's Secret 3
Content: Members of the Engineering Force can hear their captain and vice-captain arguing almost every day. Although it sounds like Karenina is winning, Teddy is also impeccable. Currently, Karenina's win-loss ratio against Teddy is 126:382.

Title: Scire's Secret 4
Content: Even in Babylonia, people like Karenina who have pursued education after becoming Constructs were very rare, not to mention that she graduated with the highest score among all students in her major.

Title: Scire's Secret 5
Content: During her study, Karenina tried learning musical instruments and eventually chose to learn the drums. Her vocal teacher at the time described the sound as "the beats that strike the soul" and soon after that, advised her to quit in a gentle manner.

Title: Scire's Secret 6
Content: To adapt to the new combat style, Karenina has to go through high-intensity zero-gravity and hyper-gravity training every day. The biggest struggle to overcome is to avoid being hit by her two ponytails in the face during the spin.

Title: Scire's Secret 7
Content: The Blast Hammer was intentionally designed to retain the capability of launching projectiles, so that Karenina can still "bring back her good old days" from time to time. As her shooting targets are usually the ruins that need to be demolished, this leisure activity of hers has actually saved a large amount of money that would otherwise be spent on demolition machinery.

Title: Scire's Secret 8
Content: Due to the slight difference between the simulated gravity on the Moon and Babylonia, Karenina often hit the ceiling for exerting too much force when she first arrived on the Moon.

Title: Scire's Secret 9
Content: When Karenina was back to Babylonia, it took her some time to get used to the simulated gravity there. She acted gently even when walking. Surprised by her overly delicate movements, members suggested her to get more rest.

Title: Scire's Secret 10
Content: For a long time, Karenina didn't understand why people kept looking at the top of her head while talking to her, until the Gray Raven Commandant explained that her Inver-Device shook back and forth when she talked.

Title: Scire's Secret 11
Content: Karenina seems to become more "candid" than before. When Bianca pointed this out with relief, Karenina explained that it was only a self-abandonment behavior because she couldn't turn off the emotional perception function of her Inver-Device.

Title: Scire's Secret 12
Content: Tip for getting leave approved in the Engineering Force: Leave applications have at least 30% more chance to be approved when Gray Raven's Commandant is at the Engineering Force. —Teddy

Title: Arca's Secret 1
Content: When he was a kid, he read a lot of mangas in the book storage room, and there were quite some weird ones among them. As a result, he can enjoy all kinds of books, especially those recommended by his comrades. He will make sure to finish them.

Title: Arca's Secret 2
Content: He once left a manga in City 075 in order to make room for supplies in his bag. While investigating the place, Gray Raven found the book, which had a pear blossom between the pages. Later, he retrieved the book, but lost it again when he was severely injured in City 210.

Title: Arca's Secret 3
Content: Noan still dreams of his past from time to time. Now he can become aware of the dream and wake up, because the clockwork firefly is always intact in the dream.

Title: Arca's Secret 4
Content: He has lost count of the skills he learned in the past in order to survive. There is one thing he isn't good at, though, which is cooking. That's because he didn't have the chance to cook before he became a Construct. Now he can make decent food as long as there is a recipe to follow. Sometimes he still tries to eat the offcut ingredients, because he thinks throwing them away is a waste.

Title: Arca's Secret 5
Content: Whenever he doesn't know what to say, he'd start to tell weird jokes with a perfectly straight face. Most of the time people think he is being serious, because he definitely looks it. Before he begins, Noan would always say "Let me tell you a secret." If the listener takes it, though, he'll start to explain. That is, if he still has the chance.

Title: Arca's Secret 6
Content: His comrades from the Cargo Crew used to say he was very good at consoling people. As a result, he was often asked to talk with others over a drink. Noan doesn't drink. He doesn't even like the smell of alcohol and tobacco. Still, he won't leave someone who needs help and company alone.

Title: Arca's Secret 7
Content: He doesn't know how to react to tears, nor can he tell if someone is faking crying. Whenever someone cries, he gets very nervous, even though he manages to maintain a straight face. He also tends to say yes to things he usually wouldn't at such times.

Title: Arca's Secret 8
Content: If there is an afterlife, Noan wants to be a seagull. Actually, he had never seen the sea or a seagull before he became a Construct.

Title: Arca's Secret 9
Content: He was known to be a stubborn kid on Commoner Carriage N before the age of thirteen. A few reckless rebellions earned him the nickname "prickly chestnut" behind his back. However, since he never had the chance to see chestnut shells or anyone getting injured from picking chestnuts, he didn't realize the nickname was meant for him at all.

Title: Arca's Secret 10
Content: Noan doesn't really have a preference for colors, but he does like things that are white and pure, like white fabrics, white feathers, clouds on a sunny day, clean paper... The only white thing he doesn't like is snow, especially a snowy field that stretches beyond the horizon.

Title: Arca's Secret 11
Content: He has a friendly personality. He used to have a lot of friends when he was a human, but only really connected with a few of them. He tends to be slow and reluctant to react to people. Most of the time he won't open up until he has known someone for a long while. He'll only want to get closer to someone when he becomes familiar with them.

Title: Arca's Secret 12
Content: He tells his true feelings to those who he feels close to. When he realizes that certain things he says will cause them to react in a funny way, he'd occasionally make fun of them on purpose. He is aware that he is still a kid deep inside, but he doesn't intend to pretend otherwise in front of his friends.

Title: Stigmata's Secret 1
Content: Because Stigmata's appearance and specifications are much different from Zero's, when Bianca first appeared before the Purifying Force in this frame, some members did not even recognize her as their captain.

Title: Stigmata's Secret 2
Content: When Bianca was appointed as the captain of the Purifying Force, most of the members were displeased. But after she "courteously" invited all members to spend one day with her in the training room, all doubts and gloom disappeared as if they had never existed.

Title: Stigmata's Secret 3
Content: Fond of reading and studying literature, Bianca once had an enthusiasm for creating a movie script sparked in her mind. However, it quickly cooled off when she could not think up a name for her movie. To this day, that ambition still resides in a little corner of her heart.

Title: Stigmata's Secret 4
Content: Chiko once said that Bianca "has ferocious aggressiveness deep within her heart." It left Bianca completely bewildered, but no matter how hard she pressed for an explanation, Chiko never revealed the reasons behind her judgment.

Title: Stigmata's Secret 5
Content: The head-mounted Inver-Device is specially devised to operate with the Phantom Tracer, which can most accurately detect and capture the Punishing Virus residuals. Although it appears to have rotatable joints, it actually cannot be rotated.

Title: Stigmata's Secret 6
Content: In order to enhance the "lamp-like" feeling, the Phantom Tracer is equipped with a lighting function. However, because Mother's tissue sealed inside will also emit an apparitional light when this function is activated, Bianca has avoided using it to prevent unnecessary anxiety.

Title: Stigmata's Secret 7
Content: Bianca's biggest interest is watching movies. There are even display cabinets in her personal dorm specifically for classic literary movie discs that she spent most of her salary on. After switching into Stigmata, she has become hooked on knight-themed fantasy movies from the Golden Age.

Title: Stigmata's Secret 8
Content: The Swordstaff was originally called "Black Excalibur" in its designer's personal file before being finalized as "Hecate". As it was too different from Bianca's style, Bianca rejected it once it was proposed.

Title: Stigmata's Secret 9
Content: Perhaps not many people noticed it, but Bianca and Chiko were actually good friends. They once went to the movies together on their day off in Babylonia, but had a big disagreement over whether to watch a romance or a spy movie.

Title: Stigmata's Secret 10
Content: Bianca was once ridiculed as a "half-baked captain" within the Purifying Force. In order to fortify Bianca's leadership, Chiko did many things with great effort behind the scenes, but the two of them never spoke about it even though Bianca was aware of what Chiko had done.

Title: Stigmata's Secret 11
Content: Karenina once strongly demanded an investigation into the structural and safety issues of the Phantom Tracer as she was concerned that it would inflict irreversible damage on Bianca's M.I.N.D. After facing repeated harsh rejections from Kurono, Bianca spent a long time reassuring Karenina not to worry about her.

Title: Stigmata's Secret 12
Content: Due to the different natures of the Purifying Force and the Task Force, Bianca did not share much time with the commandant of Gray Raven. Naturally, before their first Deep M.I.N.D. connection, Gray Raven's commandant was worried that their connection would be unstable, but it turned out they achieved a high and stable sync rate every time they established a Deep M.I.N.D. connection.

Title: Vitrum's Secret 1
Content: Bambinata used to have her hair down. But one day she woke up and naturally braided her hair in the old style.

Title: Vitrum's Secret 2
Content: Bambinata always keeps the frame clean. Except in special circumstances, she will never show up in a mess in the team preparation room.

Title: Vitrum's Secret 3
Content: Bambinata occasionally had some strange memory fragments about Vanessa in her sleep. Out of curiosity, she once kept simple notes about them in her personal terminal. But perhaps she forgot about the file, the last edit history was almost a hundred days ago.

Title: Vitrum's Secret 4
Content: Actually, Bambinata is good at noticing others' emotions but will only react to her mistress or the people her mistress cares about.

Title: Vitrum's Secret 5
Content: The storage box beside Bambinata's sleeping pod stores the "treasures" she collected over time, but she has already forgotten why she kept most of them in the first place.

Title: Vitrum's Secret 6
Content: On her way back from a mission to rescue a trapped WGAA member, Bambinata's perfect reactions to classical music were noticed by the member. After landing, the WGAA member sent ten inquiry letters in a row to the Egret Squad to ask if Bambinata's interested in joining the classical dance performance.

Title: Vitrum's Secret 7
Content: The part that looks like a "tail" on the frame is created to keep Bambinata in balance. It was originally a black globe module but was eventually modified into this soft, beautiful design at the urging of Vanessa.

Title: Vitrum's Secret 8
Content: Bambinata always thinks that her name was given by her mistress, but according to the records in her background check file, she seemed to have been given this name before being handed to Dr. Raymond.

Title: Vitrum's Secret 9
Content: Bambinata was once involved in a mission to protect a target in the Conservation Area on the surface. Nothing unexpected happened during the mission. But to everyone's surprise, Construct Bambinata seemed to be very popular among children.

Title: Vitrum's Secret 10
Content: Bambinata once received an invitation from an anonymous sender in the Little League, but she didn't go to the address in the letter.

Title: Vitrum's Secret 11
Content: Bambinata is bad at games, including rock-paper-scissors, but Vanessa enjoys having and watching Bambinata play games.

Title: Vitrum's Secret 12
Content: The frame prototype could be dated back to Kurono's early experiment-exclusive version, but you'll only get "invalid code" if you search with the prototype frame code. And if you search the entire batch, you'll get "non-existent batch" instead.

Title: Hyperreal's Secret 1
Content: There are always staff and Constructs talking about Lee's new frame, as it looks vastly different from the old one, but Lee doesn't know that they are talking about him.

Title: Hyperreal's Secret 2
Content: Lee has developed the habit of working at night as he was required to do so by his old job. A few Constructs were scared by him at night during Lee's early days in Babylonia. He was even once known as the midnight ghost in the lounge.

Title: Hyperreal's Secret 3
Content: Lee was not interested in philosophy at all. However, after switching to the Hyperreal frame, he started to read books such as The Concept of Time and Being and Time and take notes.

Title: Hyperreal's Secret 4
Content: During his rest time, Lee will adjust weapons and the exoskeleton for the Gray Raven members based on their individual preferences. This is a responsibility he is reluctant to delegate, given his past experience of a mishap where the commandant suffered dislocation due to inaccurately positioned equipment that had been repaired by someone else.

Title: Hyperreal's Secret 5
Content: Lee found some luminous parts of the Hyperreal frame redundant and attempted to cover them up. However, a researcher found it out and stopped him with the reason that these parts "can help the frame lose heat effectively."

Title: Hyperreal's Secret 6
Content: One of Lee's hobbies is playing number games such as sudoku. Although he has invited other Gray Raven members to join him, the commandant is the only one willing to play these games "full of the fun of logical thinking" with him.

Title: Hyperreal's Secret 7
Content: Lee doesn't like to talk about the part related to Kurono in his file. Although Vera would occasionally bring it up to make fun of him, Lee can always deal with it calmly even though deep down he still feels disgusted about that experience.

Title: Hyperreal's Secret 8
Content: The Gray Raven logo on the inside of the frame's special combat coat was sprayed by Lee. No one had discovered the logo until half of the coat was modified to make it easier for Lee to gather strength.

Title: Hyperreal's Secret 9
Content: Although Lee prefers his old hair color, the coating research staff of WGAA told him that they had run out of storage of the hair of that color. Therefore, between the two options proposed by Asimov, i.e. "using the Inver-Device as a hat to cover the head" or using this hair color, Lee chose the second one.

Title: Hyperreal's Secret 10
Content: The arm of the new frame has gone through a second modification to match the new weapon. However, the modified arm can't fit in the original special combat suit. The third time Lee broke his sleeve when gathering strength from his arm, he finally lost patience and tore off the sleeve.

Title: Hyperreal's Secret 11
Content: Lee came up with an "exclusive cipher" to chat with Murray when he was little, but he hadn't been able to use it for a long time until he recently received Murray's comms that brought it back to his life again.

Title: Hyperreal's Secret 12
Content: Lee rarely cooks, for he will turn the kitchen into a lab by measuring everything to the milligram the minute he walks in and picks up a seasoning box. Although not good at cooking, Lee is surprisingly good at making coffee because some commandant loves drinking coffee for breakfast.

Title: Kaleido's Secret 1
Content: The frame keeps Ayla's favorite beret since Brilliance. She is on the "work mode" once she puts it on.

Title: Kaleido's Secret 2
Content: Ayla releases her stress by painting. She once painted 37 oil paintings, 86 sketches, and 3 120-page manga in one month—the record still stands to this day.

Title: Kaleido's Secret 3
Content: Ayla's manga creation drew the attention of several WGAA members to the potential of this art form. Soon afterward, WGAA established its own manga magazine and made Allen as its editor-in-chief. The magazine was once one of the best-selling cultural products in Babylonia.

Title: Kaleido's Secret 4
Content: Before the Beam Gunlance was adopted, the new frame was once designed to fight with three Scythes—one in each hand, and one in the CUB's alloy arm. The Science Council's weapon designers were impressed by the unique combat plan before they denied it immediately afterward.

Title: Kaleido's Secret 5
Content: A mysterious Construct named "Nanami" kept challenging Ayla in painting competitions and losing them because her paintings were judged as "a real mess" by WGAA. But Ayla feels an unspeakable sense of uniqueness that can't be measured by the traditional standards in Nanami's works.

Title: Kaleido's Secret 6
Content: Ayla has designed many coatings for Babylonia's Constructs. Her schedule is fully booked until three years later. An obsessed Support Construct once hacked into WGAA's system just to jump the line. The Construct ended up being blacklisted for life by Ayla.

Title: Kaleido's Secret 7
Content: Ayla once held free Construct art classes in Babylonia. She found many painting talents in the process but also learned about what "someone without a shred of art talent" looked like.

Title: Kaleido's Secret 8
Content: Ayla started to acquire financial knowledge after realizing her assets were growing. She bought an empty entertainment area Babylonia newly developed for the rich at the lowest price and transferred it to the Center of Basic Public Education for free to build new facilities.

Title: Kaleido's Secret 9
Content: In between archaeological missions, Ayla prints out her manga, gives them to the children in conservation areas for free, and asks for their opinions. She was once immediately surrounded by the kids eagerly requesting the next manga release after entering a conservation area.

Title: Kaleido's Secret 10
Content: The Archaeological Team held a grand farewell party for Ayla before she joined Iris Warbler. However, after they bid farewell to Ayla with tears, they saw her name again on the list of persons for an archaeological mission right the next day—as the Task Force's retinue and external technician.

Title: Kaleido's Secret 11
Content: Ayla is not a born optimist. She decided to hide her setbacks and struggles away from others just because she realized that everyone loved "Ayla's smile." This is not a disguise, because she believes that a forever happy Ayla is the ideal self she wants.

Title: Kaleido's Secret 12
Content: Practicing more than dozens of signatures, she's been waiting for someone special to ask for her autograph.

Title: Crimson Weave's Secret 1
Content: Even though Crimson Weave's related modules and materials haven't been deliberately improved, the frame's cold and embrittlement resistance seems to be better than before.

Title: Crimson Weave's Secret 2
Content: At first, she thought the energy overflowing from the frame's left eye was an eye module failure.

Title: Crimson Weave's Secret 3
Content: She is happy with the high ponytail, because it's neat.

Title: Crimson Weave's Secret 4
Content: The frame can use energy to create an effect similar to the magnetic force, therefore the way it carries the weapon is more flexible than the previous frames.

Title: Crimson Weave's Secret 5
Content: As it's quick and easy for her to pull out the kodachi, the kodachi itself is sometimes used as a climbing pick, a can opener, a wood-carving knife, etc.

Title: Crimson Weave's Secret 6
Content: Crimson Weave can let Motorbolt use her energy in an emergency.

Title: Crimson Weave's Secret 7
Content: The metal restraints on the left arm and wrist can only provide limited support. However, anyone who mistakes it as the frame's weakness, they'll probably have to face up to a tough fight.

Title: Crimson Weave's Secret 8
Content: She suppresses the Punishing power with her own strength and concentrates it in the left arm.

Title: Crimson Weave's Secret 9
Content: No one knows when she started to love climbing mountains, especially the moment of standing on the top of the mountain after a trek.

Title: Crimson Weave's Secret 10
Content: Somehow her hair end became red. She wanted to cut it off but felt it's better to have some difference.

Title: Crimson Weave's Secret 11
Content: She realized that what happened to her and Luna was not just physical change. There were times that she wanted to talk about it with Luna but ended up deciding to just go with the flow.

Title: Crimson Weave's Secret 12
Content: Her interest in powerful pets and rivals has waned, perhaps because she has found someone who is neither a pet nor a rival but can constantly pique her curiosity.

Title: Zitherwoe's Secret 1
Content: Hanying used to ask Haicma for housekeeping knowledge. She learned everything carefully when Haicma showed her how to kill pests in large houses with great passion. But she gave up after the two of them caused a small mess in the Church of Machina.

Title: Zitherwoe's Secret 2
Content: Hanying danced with a sword, an umbrella, and a fan during the first years of her dancing career. But after years of performing on stage, she eventually selected to dance with a fan. "The sword is too heavy, while the fan is too gentle. And we Kowloongers always choose to be moderate."

Title: Zitherwoe's Secret 3
Content: Hanying is good at cooking with a lot of the Nighter's dish recipes stored in her memory shell and hundreds of dessert recipes due to Pulao's preference for desserts.

Title: Zitherwoe's Secret 4
Content: Some mechanoids interested in dancing in the Church of Machina asked Hanying to teach them. Hanying treated them seriously and even wrote an electronic brochure about Kowloong's ancient music and dances.

Title: Zitherwoe's Secret 5
Content: Hanying loves animals, especially cats. Because she thinks their steps are gentle and quiet just like some dance steps.

Title: Zitherwoe's Secret 6
Content: Hanying has become a big master of the knowledge of traditional Kowloong through years of reading and practice just like a human instead of data input. However, she rarely talks about it. And when she spots mistakes quoting things, she always corrects them politely.

Title: Zitherwoe's Secret 7
Content: "That Villier... is absolutely a genius. Not just in terms of machine manufacturing, but also in terms of structure design... Absolutely! Damn! I hate to admit it! Our current machine manufacturing level is even worse than that of Kowloong half century ago?" —"Magician", CTO of the Church of Machina

Title: Zitherwoe's Secret 8
Content: Hanying made a lot of friends on the Nighter when she was a dancer and thus received some funding. After spending some of it to help those around her and some to pay for Pulao's Construct surgery, she now has no money left.

Title: Zitherwoe's Secret 9
Content: Although Hanying has a complicated relationship with "dreams," she doesn't love them.

Title: Zitherwoe's Secret 10
Content: "Gentle" is the most frequent word people use to describe Hanying. Some of her elegance came from her awakened "heart," and some came from the life and death she has seen.

Title: Zitherwoe's Secret 11
Content: Hanying is a mechanoid who "cries." And even her tears have the same elements as those of human tears.

Title: Zitherwoe's Secret 12
Content: Hanying's current outfit is the only costume she has on the Nighter and the only thing she regards as "her stuff."

Title: Feral's Secret 1
Content: No. 21 talks privately to her weapon claws and her balancing tail.

Title: Feral's Secret 2
Content: No. 21 sometimes forgets that there is no bandage over her left eye and only covers her right eye subconsciously when asked to cover her eyes.

Title: Feral's Secret 3
Content: No. 21 seems to be more curious than before and is often seen following people around and asking questions. However, she has rarely been seen imitating others' behaviors recently.

Title: Feral's Secret 4
Content: Gray Raven Commandant once mentioned to have seen a natural smile on No. 21's face. She spent the whole night practicing smiling in front of the mirror in the lounge secretly, trying to recreate the natural smile Gray Raven Commandant mentioned. But perhaps she tried too hard, all she got was that old weird smile.

Title: Feral's Secret 5
Content: What freedom means to No. 21 is not about what she can do but what she doesn't have to do.

Title: Feral's Secret 6
Content: No. 21 has received the special injunction and notice of "no use of weapons during meetings on public facilities" twice.

Title: Feral's Secret 7
Content: No. 21 secretly asked around about the whereabouts of the refugees in Canon's conservation area but failed to get any information. However, the Constructs at the data office got scared when the "legendary" Cerberus member No. 21 came up to speak to them.

Title: Feral's Secret 8
Content: Thanks to the acuity of the frame, the number of insects within No. 21's range of activity has greatly decreased. The ecological simulation department had thought it was an error in the environment setting parameters before they discovered the true cause.

Title: Feral's Secret 9
Content: White was said to be the theme color of the original coating, but in main designer Yarha's final design, it was adjusted into dark gray with a handwritten note saying, "Let's change the white color to something else... No more white frames for me."

Title: Feral's Secret 10
Content: The frame comes with liquid-alloy fingernails by default, which can deal a certain amount of damage even without a weapon equipped. No. 21 can extend her claws when needed. For example, when she attacks Noctis.

Title: Feral's Secret 11
Content: A while after the Hetero Zone incident, Leonie from the World Government Association of Art helped No. 21 make a small Snore model with the recycled Co-Bot fragments. No. 21 took it and buried it secretly in the green area around the monument in the Dominik Memorial Park. She never mentioned it to anyone after that.

Title: Feral's Secret 12
Content: One day, No. 21 thought of the question No. 20 once asked, "What do you want to do after you leave the institute?" No. 21 realizes she can already answer that question with actual behaviors.

Title: Indomitus' Secret 1
Content: Although he "looks" good at drinking, Noctis would be breakdancing for two hours on the meeting table after only a few cups of alcohol-flavor electrolyte.

Title: Indomitus' Secret 2
Content: Noctis would carefully analyze why his bombs were lack of power during the previous battle. It's also the only thing he would voluntarily reflect on.

Title: Indomitus' Secret 3
Content: Noctis is actually good at driving. He can even handle a transport craft if he has to. However, he always runs into unexpected situations when he's in a vehicle, whether in the sky, on the ground, or under the water—Babylonia remains the only exception so far.

Title: Indomitus' Secret 4
Content: Noctis once avoided arguing with No. 21 for a whole day, which gave No. 21 quite a shock. Noctis' abnormal behavior drew Vera's attention. She immediately sent him to the Star of Life in the name of M.I.N.D. malfunction.

Title: Indomitus' Secret 5
Content: Noctis is sometimes asked to remove his weapon when entering some facilities. No. 21 often makes fun of it by asking him to disarm himself.

Title: Indomitus' Secret 6
Content: Noctis rarely brings up his past with others, but Vera and No. 21 are just pretending that they don't know about it.

Title: Indomitus' Secret 7
Content: Sometimes Cerberus would have some gray income, but the squad is always short of money because Noctis always spends money lavishly.

Title: Indomitus' Secret 8
Content: Red is Noctis' favorite color. The light of explosions, the bloodstains that got on him when hitting enemies, the vital fluid, his hair, the patterns on his coating, and even his own vital fluid. Although he doesn't know why he's so attracted to the color.

Title: Indomitus' Secret 9
Content: Noctis seriously considered joining the Engineering Force's demolition squad when leaving the Purifying Force, but the demolition squad's team leader back then wisely rejected him, foreseeing what lay ahead.

Title: Indomitus' Secret 10
Content: When not on mission, Noctis loves collecting Golden-Age rock music albums and even plays some riffs.

Title: Indomitus' Secret 11
Content: Noctis is a regular at the Babylonia's military court and the famous "militant" in the Task Force. However, among every ten cases involving Noctis, at least eight were him fighting for Cerberus.

Title: Indomitus' Secret 12
Content: Noctis always sticks to his decisions once he makes up his mind, whether it is the people he decides to follow or the things he decides to do. Both Cerberus and the commandant who he has been through the fire with are good examples.

Title: Echo's Secret 1
Content: Her serious personality and disciplined style make her a good judge.

Title: Echo's Secret 2
Content: She usually keeps a busy schedule to the point that she sometimes has to fill it up in special means.

Title: Echo's Secret 3
Content: The special means here is that Echo would ask Cecily to secretly help her with low-priority missions when she has to, as long as it doesn't break the rules of course.

Title: Echo's Secret 4
Content: Surprisingly, Echo is willing to accept new things that she doesn't understand. For example, she once tied bombs to arrows and used them as demolishing arrows with the help of some people. And...

Title: Echo's Secret 5
Content: She was once forced to taste a range of special recipes. After that, she will always go for strange-flavor dipping sauces when having fruit.

Title: Echo's Secret 6
Content: Echo is good at surviving in the wild, especially at starting a campfire without fuel. She taught this skill to the Gray Raven Commandant.

Title: Echo's Secret 7
Content: Echo has a rigorous battle style and rarely acts on impulse. But when she gets impulsive, almost no one could stop her, not even Cecily.

Title: Echo's Secret 8
Content: Echo is very concerned about her Coating. She visits Babylonia clothing stores or accessory stores in her spare time.

Title: Echo's Secret 9
Content: There was no terminal connected to the outside world in Utopia, so Echo got obsessed with the Construct terminal and stubbornly incorporated her manners into the terminal network after Babylonia officially gave it to her.

Title: Echo's Secret 10
Content: Echo enjoys listening to mock trails when at Babylonia. She even holds a record of listening to 35 mock trials in a row. No one has broken the record so far.

Title: Echo's Secret 11
Content: Echo always zones out to chill. Sometimes she's just emptying her mind. Sometimes she's communicating with Cecily.

Title: Echo's Secret 12
Content: Echo loves writing poems, but she won't publish them. Recently, her notebook is full of lines regarding darkness and fire, night and stars, and... the one accompanying her.

Title: Lost Lullaby's Secret 1
Content: Lamia is by nature curious about everything she doesn't understand, but she would quietly give up exploring them once she finds it hard to satisfy her curiosity.

Title: Lost Lullaby's Secret 2
Content: Due to her childhood experience, Lamia always feels unconfident about her abilities even after becoming an Ascendant and never thinks she's "strong."

Title: Lost Lullaby's Secret 3
Content: Lamia is surprisingly fond of staying with familiar people (no more than 3) than being alone. She hates to be ignored. Even though she's not good at making friends, she still wants companions.

Title: Lost Lullaby's Secret 4
Content: Due to her education and actual mental age, Lamia is not good at language expression or complex metaphors, but this doesn't mean she can't tell if someone is satirizing her.

Title: Lost Lullaby's Secret 5
Content: Lamia tried to self-study language and literature courses, but she gave it up soon afterward, comforting herself that she could live without such knowledge.

Title: Lost Lullaby's Secret 6
Content: After meeting Luna, Lamia joined the Ascendant team led by Luna. Although she doesn't quite get along with her teammates, it is after all a small group that she can fit in.

Title: Lost Lullaby's Secret 7
Content: Lamia has written a book named 100 (Scratched) 50 (Scratched) 10 Slacker's Skills to Look Busy. However, there's only one published copy of it in addition to the original manuscript written with messy wording.

Title: Lost Lullaby's Secret 8
Content: Lamia is surprisingly decisive in terms of handling "important matters." For example, when Atlantis' medical director asked her if she wanted to be made into a Construct, she agreed without much hesitation.

Title: Lost Lullaby's Secret 9
Content: Lamia tends to conceal herself in front of strangers. Having been wandering around the world for a long time, she has learned to protect her fragile heart with lies.

Title: Lost Lullaby's Secret 10
Content: The prerequisite to be free is to "survive." And to survive, one can sacrifice anything. This is the last thing Lamia was taught before she left Atlantis.

Title: Lost Lullaby's Secret 11
Content: Lamia's tail is a sensitive part of her frame both before and after the enhancement.

Title: Lost Lullaby's Secret 12
Content: Lamia wants to live a carefree lifestyle, but if she's going to live with a certain human, she can lower her standards a bit, and maybe even more... "No, no more! That's it!"

Title: BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER's Secret 1
Content: She tends to conceal her feelings.

Title: BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER's Secret 2
Content: She has fought various enemies.

Title: BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER's Secret 3
Content: She has been to many places.

Title: BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER's Secret 4
Content: She and DEAD MASTER are deeply bound.

Title: BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER's Secret 5
Content: She has made new "enemies" and "friends" this time.

Title: Epitaph's Secret 1
Content: For some odd reason, no one has ever called Watanabe "Uncle Wata" in person again since he switched to the new frame.

Title: Epitaph's Secret 2
Content: Although the new frame didn't exhibit the heterochromia issue found in Nightblade, Watanabe, growing unwilling to change the old look, reached out to the technicians to revert back to the previous blue prosthetic eye. Now concealed beneath the eyepatch, it remains a part of his appearance.

Title: Epitaph's Secret 3
Content: Lately, he has raised his standards for the nutritional balance of the camp's meals, prompting serious deliberation on the prospect of livestock farming. However, the industrial feeding facilities from the Golden Age have been completely abandoned and are vulnerable to attacks from the Corrupted. It will also be no easy task to train herdsmen capable of defending themselves.

Title: Epitaph's Secret 4
Content: Since his teenage years, Watanabe had been learning high society's social etiquette. Even though he no longer has chances to showcase it, he would gladly impart his knowledge to anyone if they ask.

Title: Epitaph's Secret 5
Content: Watanabe's father personally taught him how to use a razor, emphasizing the importance of maintaining a neat and tidy appearance. Despite no longer needing to shave his beard as a Construct, he continues to uphold his morning routine out of habit.

Title: Epitaph's Secret 6
Content: Occasionally, adopted children at the camp would approach Watanabe, insisting on dragging him along to be one of the last participants in a game of hide-and-seek.

Title: Epitaph's Secret 7
Content: Watanabe remembers the lyrics to many classic pop songs from the Golden Age and occasionally transcribes them in a notebook. Some Forsaken soldiers once stumbled upon this notebook, mistaking it for a collection of love poems and widely circulating it through the camp.

Title: Epitaph's Secret 8
Content: During his youth, Watanabe harbored a passion for science fiction literature and was well acquainted with the theories of related technologies. However, he now experiences mixed emotions as he witnesses the gradual realization of these once purely theoretical advancements for military applications.

Title: Epitaph's Secret 9
Content: Watanabe has many acquaintances within the diverse armed strongholds scattered across the surface. Over time, he has received numerous invitations to assume leadership positions, yet he has declined each one. Some of these individuals eventually joined the Forsaken, while others continue to maintain positive relationships with them to this day.

Title: Epitaph's Secret 10
Content: Watanabe holds conflicting sentiments toward Epitaph due to the presence of Ballard's scheme in its design as well as his careful thoughts for Watanabe. If Ballard had not made the fateful decision to turn against his own people, everything could have unfolded very differently.

Title: Epitaph's Secret 11
Content: While Watanabe has managed to release his past grudges, his unwillingness to associate with Babylonia still persists. Only a single commandant is granted access to his private room.

Title: Epitaph's Secret 12
Content: Following the battle against Ballard, Watanabe has gradually released the burdens weighing on his heart. He no longer forces himself to endure everything alone and instead learns to work together with his comrades.

Title: Shukra's Secret 1
Content: Qu sometimes practices the old way with the new frame and immediately adjusts after realizing she's using Shukra instead of Pavo.

Title: Shukra's Secret 2
