Content: Even though e-books are the trend, Qu still keeps the habit of reading paper books, not only to quickly go through the content but also to enjoy the momentary thoughts when turning the pages.

Title: Shukra's Secret 3
Content: Qu usually follows a very regular routine. However, her recent busy schedule has caused her to sometimes fall asleep while reading files. She finishes the remaining work even if it's already morning when she wakes up.

Title: Shukra's Secret 4
Content: Qu sometimes collects information on Babylonia, including technology development and personal scheduling, especially things related to the commandant.

Title: Shukra's Secret 5
Content: When there is an emergency, Qu will send Huiyu for on-site checking and then determine whether to order it to attack accordingly.

Title: Shukra's Secret 6
Content: Qu observes the enemy's actions to learn the pattern and then focuses on finding the flaws of it.

Title: Shukra's Secret 7
Content: Qu normally plans her schedule in advance with workload beyond what she can handle. It will be filled with many old issues and new missions in no time.

Title: Shukra's Secret 8
Content: It's said that Qu has a notebook for work notes. Some say it's actually a collection of her poems. In fact, no one has seen this mysterious notebook.

Title: Shukra's Secret 9
Content: Qu is very concerned about the layout of the furniture. Everything should look neat and decent. She even has strict standards for the style and color of small objects and ornaments.

Title: Shukra's Secret 10
Content: Qu is an expert in ink paintings. She rarely has the time to paint anything, so she prefers to appreciate other painters' work. She will send people to look for the original copy of any painting she finds interesting.

Title: Shukra's Secret 11
Content: Qu cares more about what people do than what they say. She analyzes behaviors to determine their intentions and then decides how to interact with them.

Title: Shukra's Secret 12
Content: Qu named a star after the commandant's name. Sometimes, she still observes its trajectory and records the time when it's closest to Earth.

Title: Decryptor's Secret 1
Content: Teddy avoids crowded environments and prefers the solitude of her workroom, where she can focus on machinery rather than navigate social complexities. Interactions with people are perceived as distracting to her.

Title: Decryptor's Secret 2
Content: Teddy is confident in her technical abilities but shows little interest in publishing papers or featuring in periodicals. She values validating her ideas through practical methods over indulging in empty discourse.

Title: Decryptor's Secret 3
Content: Despite Teddy's somewhat condescending appearance and demeanor, she maintains politeness when interacting with strangers, projecting the image of a cultured young lady from an affluent background.

Title: Decryptor's Secret 4
Content: Teddy often bickers with Karenina over work matters. While she may not match Karenina in assertiveness, she still prevails in most of their arguments due to her clear logic.

Title: Decryptor's Secret 5
Content: Teddy developed a passion for programming at a young age and excels in infiltration, successfully breaching numerous heavily secured systems. She is a legendary and enigmatic figure in the hacker community.

Title: Decryptor's Secret 6
Content: Teddy once covertly hacked into Karenina's personal computer. Although she didn't uncover anything intriguing, she still helped Karenina upgrade her firewall during the process.

Title: Decryptor's Secret 7
Content: Teddy adores black tea. Even after completing a task and finding herself beside a grimy maintenance machine, she still indulges in her favorite drink without hesitation.

Title: Decryptor's Secret 8
Content: Teddy frequently comes up with innovative ideas. She would execute them effectively, test and validate every solution regardless of the risks involved, and calmly reassess them when they encounter setbacks.

Title: Decryptor's Secret 9
Content: Teddy rebels against the strict regulations of the Engineering Force, often arriving late or leaving early at her own discretion. Despite receiving reminders, she feigns compliance with humility and remains steadfast in her refusal to change her ways.

Title: Decryptor's Secret 10
Content: The Engineering Force Regulations posted on the wall was torn down by Teddy. Despite feigning ignorance initially, she eventually admitted to her actions in reluctance.

Title: Decryptor's Secret 11
Content: Teddy appreciates a wide range of music genres, spanning from classical to avant-garde rock, and has a moderate level of skill in music production.

Title: Decryptor's Secret 12
Content: Teddy has a sensitive nature. She is reserved around strangers but holds warmth within. She harbors numerous emotions internally and is reluctant to openly share her true thoughts with others.

Title: Oblivion's Secret 1
Content: Luna is more concerned about the cleanliness of the environment now because she's worried that her frame would devour anything unclean by mistake.

Title: Oblivion's Secret 2
Content: Luna will build Punishing hetero warehouses in secret places and store anything she finds interesting and not portable there.

Title: Oblivion's Secret 3
Content: Luna sometimes thinks of that white figure in the Ascension-Network and wonders from when they started to become different.

Title: Oblivion's Secret 4
Content: During her time off, Luna sometimes visits her childhood home to check on the snow orchid in the crack of the floor.

Title: Oblivion's Secret 5
Content: Luna is more willing to talk to people now, but she's more of a listener during communications with people other than her sister.

Title: Oblivion's Secret 6
Content: When Luna's consciousness gets immersed in the Ascension-Network, her eyes would go out of focus as if she's zoning out.

Title: Oblivion's Secret 7
Content: One of Luna's ways to stabilize her M.I.N.D is to speak to the night light.

Title: Oblivion's Secret 8
Content: Although Luna's capable of precise control of the Punishing Virus, it is also a huge waste of energy since she also needs to stabilize herself all the time. Therefore, she won't limit her power unless it's necessary.

Title: Oblivion's Secret 9
Content: After going through a series of things, Luna's attitude toward Roland and Lamia has softened. Normally, she would accept their requests when they ask her for help... as long as they're not pushing it too far, of course.

Title: Oblivion's Secret 10
Content: The black wing on Luna's back is a lethal weapon, but in most battles, Luna just uses it to fan away the dust in front of her—according to statistics, the total time of it serving as a fan even goes beyond that of it serving as a weapon.

Title: Oblivion's Secret 11
Content: Luna once thought of having a new hairstyle that would go along with her new frame. However, after seeing different hairstyles through calculations, she finally decided to keep the original hairstyle. She thinks it's more suitable to her. Moreover, a familiar hairstyle helps a lot in stabilizing herself.

Title: Oblivion's Secret 12
Content: Luna is too proud to avoid her enemies. Whether it is Babylonia's Task Force or any other enemy, she would face them head-on in a nearly provocative manner... But proud as she is, she still looks a bit awkward in front of some people and in some occasions.

Title: Ardeo's Secret 1
Content: Bridget didn't have any special requirements for the parameters and design of the frame—this is what she told the Science Council researchers when they were busy working on the Ardeo frame. She wanted them to spend the time on enhancing other teammates' frames instead.

Title: Ardeo's Secret 2
Content: Support Force members usually call Bridget "Boss" privately. Every time when they're on external missions, Celica always has to remind them to make sure to call Bridget "Captain" in front of big names.

Title: Ardeo's Secret 3
Content: Bridget is a huge fan of collecting various sunglasses. She even has the prop sunglasses of the main character from a classic Golden Age movie. She also changes sunglasses to match her mood of the day, but few could notice the difference.

Title: Ardeo's Secret 4
Content: Bridget excels in machine maintenance and modification and always dedicates her time off to fixing machines. According to herself, it's not because she has obsession with machines. It's just that her familiarity with wrenches and machine oil makes her feel comfortable.

Title: Ardeo's Secret 5
Content: A long time ago, Ruolin mentioned both directly and indirectly that she envies Bridget for how strongly built she is. Although Bridget claims that her current frame is in a size different from the one she had during the modification, according to workers from the Star of Life, calculations based on her everyday training intensity show that the current frame is a perfect match for her.

Title: Ardeo's Secret 6
Content: Bridget has joined some mysterious group named "Alcohol-Flavor Electrolyte and Wine Tasting Association". However, it's said that the group has a catchier name—Drunkard Association.

Title: Ardeo's Secret 7
Content: Being the Captain of the Support Force for a long time, Bridget has helped many Constructs, which has earned her a good reputation among most Constructs.

Title: Ardeo's Secret 8
Content: Although there are rumors about Bridget's violent driving style across different forces, she actually drives as well as she fixes things. She has never had an accident so far.

Title: Ardeo's Secret 9
Content: Bridget loves the beer-like alcohol-flavor electrolyte, especially the cold one at five degrees Celsius. She has a strong tolerance of alcohol and has always been the one who got everybody back to the dormitory after drinking contests among captains.

Title: Ardeo's Secret 10
Content: Born in the late Golden Age, Bridget knows a lot of old jokes. Therefore, there's a rumor among the Support Force teammates that "Sometimes Boss would tell jokes that are really confusing."

Title: Ardeo's Secret 11
Content: Bridget is proficient in most existing combat techniques. For example, kickboxing, Chinese kickboxing, wrestling, and MMA. However, according to herself, she's not a martial art expert. She just happened to master them through long-term learning and actual battles.

Title: Ardeo's Secret 12
Content: Bridget once invited Gray Raven Commandant to an event of the Alcohol-Flavor Electrolyte and Wine Tasting Association and got the Commandant a non-alcoholic drink. She had specially picked sunglasses before meeting the Commandant and eventually went with the pair that represents good luck.

Title: Solacetune's Secret 1
Content: Politely declined designs including plasma swords, four multifunctional mechanical arms, and six pairs of light wings.

Title: Solacetune's Secret 2
Content: Cares deeply about hair care, often inquiring about the best products for synthetic hair.

Title: Solacetune's Secret 3
Content: "I bet she can whip out something else!" After showcasing combat skills with a hairpin, she was rumored to have hidden weapons all over her body.

Title: Solacetune's Secret 4
Content: A skilled cook who loves exploring night markets, believing street food has a unique charm from its "authenticity," like Pulao said.

Title: Solacetune's Secret 5
Content: Considering the feasibility of a rotating pipa technique after mastering the reverse pipa.

Title: Solacetune's Secret 6
Content: Proficient in various dances, including Kowloong dances, waltz, tango, and samba.

Title: Solacetune's Secret 7
Content: Explained to other mechanoids that despite playing a four-string instrument, she can't be a bassist.

Title: Solacetune's Secret 8
Content: The new frame received hardware upgrades, but Kowloong's instruction set architecture was difficult to replace. The chief technician of the Church of Machina painstakingly studied books like "The Art of Kowloong Programming" and "Kowloong Computer Architecture Guide", ensuring the new hardware was perfectly integrated with the Geng-3-6 instruction set.

Title: Solacetune's Secret 9
Content: The sound of her pipa helps stabilize the emotional modules of mechanoids, often leading them to "sleep." During busy research times, Zavier would sneak young mechanoids next to Hanying. Despite their protests of "mechanoids don't need sleep," they would drift off to the soothing pipa melodies.

Title: Solacetune's Secret 10
Content: Not skilled in sewing but has a unique dedication to threading needles. If a loved one needs something mended, she will go to great lengths, even injuring herself, to fix it.

Title: Solacetune's Secret 11
Content: Due to the complexity of the Kowloong language, the MPK-12 was equipped with an advanced language model at production. Rumor has it that this model is so powerful it can communicate with animals. Though she hasn't boasted about it, she once used feline "language" to call back a lost kitten.

Title: Solacetune's Secret 12
Content: Can recall memories in first-person view. To kill time, she often revisits cherished memories under the guise of "sleep", with the Commandant's name frequently appearing in the logs.

Title: Lucid Dreamer's Secret 1
Content: He binds his long braid with a clip. When he lies down to rest, he removes the clip, letting his hair flow freely.

Title: Lucid Dreamer's Secret 2
Content: Everyone says that Wanshi's gun spinning trick is flawless. However, Kamui once spread a rumor that Wanshi had been practicing tirelessly in private. The rumor was quickly dispelled, supposedly because Kamui was promptly "shut up" by Wanshi.

Title: Lucid Dreamer's Secret 3
Content: He always keeps several flavors of candy in his pocket.

Title: Lucid Dreamer's Secret 4
Content: He is especially patient with children and often volunteers at the pediatric department of the Star of Life in his free time. One time, he woke after a short nap to find his long hair braided into a plait, but said nothing about it.

Title: Lucid Dreamer's Secret 5
Content: He repeatedly insists that he didn't get the new hairstyle to match Snowveil's tail.

Title: Lucid Dreamer's Secret 6
Content: When Wanshi trains with Chrome in his Lucid Dreamer frame, a blanket often appears in the spectator seats of the Strike Hawk shooting range. It's said to be specially prepared for a certain human commandant who frequently comes to watch.

Title: Lucid Dreamer's Secret 7
Content: He once came across the term "lap pillow" in a book. Since then, he has been studying how to adjust the angle of his legs to reduce the discomfort of the lap pillow, hoping it might come in handy someday.

Title: Lucid Dreamer's Secret 8
Content: Mind you: Don't approach Wanshi when he's in a bad mood after waking up. It won't end well for you. If you absolutely have to, seek out the Commandant of Gray Raven for assistance in soothing him, or ask Chrome for physical suppression.

Title: Lucid Dreamer's Secret 9
Content: He always sets very high standards for his aiming accuracy in shooting.

Title: Lucid Dreamer's Secret 10
Content: Once, Wanshi and Lee were having a shooting practice when Ayla passed by. She asked if the World Government Association of Art could create a play based on them. "Babylonia should have its own epic work," she said.

Title: Lucid Dreamer's Secret 11
Content: In one of his ground missions, he brought back a piece of amber. He likes to take it out after hibernation and stare at it in the sunlight. When asked why, he replies that it seems to trap time within the crystal-clear coffin, which he finds fascinating.

Title: Lucid Dreamer's Secret 12
Content: Now, dreams have become a simple thing for Wanshi, nothing more than ordinary, peaceful sleep. The nightmares are gone, and closing his eyes brings tranquility. He no longer needs lies to numb the pain.

Title: Pyroath's Secret 1
Content: The variety of Lucia's collections has been expanded. Now she also collects plumes and clovers.

Title: Pyroath's Secret 2
Content: In the sunlight, the Pyroath frame's platinum parts will reflect strong light that would make it hard for passerby Constructs to open their eyes.

Title: Pyroath's Secret 3
Content: Lucia's curiosity is getting stronger and stronger. She likes to try new things in private. So far, she has explored a wide range of hobbies, including gardening, painting, and singing. It's just she hasn't studied them in depth yet.

Title: Pyroath's Secret 4
Content: Now she can draw Froggie of any style in one stroke.

Title: Pyroath's Secret 5
Content: Lucia wanted to keep a bird at the Gray Raven, so she decided without hesitation that her CUB should look like a bird.

Title: Pyroath's Secret 6
Content: Sometimes Lucia would invite Commandant to play with her in the WGAA's virtual reality experience store, especially after they had the Legend of the Mermaid.

Title: Pyroath's Secret 7
Content: Lucia looks more serious as the frame carries heavy expectations of people. Some think she's unapproachable and don't dare to get close to her. But those familiar with her know that she's still the Lucia they know.

Title: Pyroath's Secret 8
Content: Lucia would sometimes read the book the Commandant has read and exchange thoughts on it with the Commandant.

Title: Pyroath's Secret 9
Content: Lucia will unconsciously touch the Gray Raven insignia on her chest before making a big decision.

Title: Pyroath's Secret 10
Content: Having been through the tough battle in the Hetero Tower, Lucia has developed a habit of touching and hugging the Commandant to check how the Commandant is doing.

Title: Pyroath's Secret 11
Content: Lucia has studied different ways of folding clovers. Most of the paper she used for this has excerpts from the Commandant's books.

Title: Pyroath's Secret 12
Content: Lucia cherishes every moment and experience she had so far and keeps a private journal about her thoughts every day, including words for the Commandant.

Title: Fulgor's Secret 1
Content: Yata hates making choices or getting into trouble but always accurately picks up the most difficult solution among all options.

Title: Fulgor's Secret 2
Content: Although Yata thinks she's too old for Cosmic Giant VS Monsters, she still cares about the latest updates on various classic tokusatsu. Sometimes she would buy Golden-Age toys from WGAA.

Title: Fulgor's Secret 3
Content: Yata would blame herself for inevitable accidents. She once refused to command others to carry out a high-risk operation as the leader.

Title: Fulgor's Secret 4
Content: The new frame has greatly enhanced the structural strength and direct combat ability but sacrificed some support units to maintain mobility. Yata spent a lot of time to get used to these changes.

Title: Fulgor's Secret 5
Content: Each of the powered arms on Yata's back has a unique processor and can process 4 different tasks without affecting one other. "They can manage their own business!" —Yata once claimed proudly.

Title: Fulgor's Secret 6
Content: Yata claims that all four powered arms are a part of her but would secretly remove the load backpack when measuring the weight.

Title: Fulgor's Secret 7
Content: Yata loves meditation and treats it as a form of training.

Title: Fulgor's Secret 8
Content: Yata is actually a big fan of the Golden Age subculture trend and a music genre called vaporwave.

Title: Fulgor's Secret 9
Content: Yata has studied a variety of weapons. She thinks fists and palms are the most classic martial arts moves, and as long as one keeps practicing fight moves, one can master any other martial arts without a teacher. She has written a book called 'Knacks for Powered Arms.'

Title: Fulgor's Secret 10
Content: Yata keeps a good habit of working out and is looking for a workout partner in Babylonia.

Title: Fulgor's Secret 11
Content: Thanks to Shorthalt's nagging, Yata learned how to fix and refit various appliances and devices and even got used to it. After Shorthalt passed away, it has become a way Yata secretly takes care of Scarab.

Title: Fulgor's Secret 12
Content: Yata wants to practice with the strong for various combat experiences. Recently, she's often seen walking into Gray Raven's longue with pen and paper, asking the Gray Raven Commandant about teamwork collaboration skills.

Title: Startrail's Secret 1
Content: The stickers on the frame now are just the tip of the iceberg. Nanami had excitedly prepared a whole bunch of cute cartoon stickers for her new frame, but Haicma quickly stopped her, saying it might "affect the image of the Sage... no, the Cardman Rider."

Title: Startrail's Secret 2
Content: The thrusters use a luminous material with a maximum brightness of over 20,000 nits. The other mechanoids call them "little suns" in private, and they can even flicker according to Nanami's mood when not in combat.

Title: Startrail's Secret 3
Content: "The higher a mechanoid's awakening level, the easier it is for humans to understand" was once a widely accepted academic theory. This theory collapsed with Nanami's appearance—facing the highest-awakened mechanoid, let alone understanding, most humans can't even keep up with her thoughts.

Title: Startrail's Secret 4
Content: Experiments on the relationship between mechanoids and humans have shown that children find it easier to communicate with Nanami than adults; artists find it easier to follow Nanami's thoughts than researchers; and in all sample data, the Commandant received the highest "Nanami Comprehension" score...

Title: Startrail's Secret 5
Content: Other mechanoids once mistook the Shield Axe, with the sword inserted into the shield, for an electric guitar. Upon learning this, Nanami happily imitated a Golden Age rock band, putting on sunglasses and humming the Cardman Rider theme song while "playing" it.

Title: Startrail's Secret 6
Content: She still tiptoes when she gets measured. When Haicma asks, she often makes excuses like "There's no gravity in space" or "I accidentally floated away."

Title: Startrail's Secret 7
Content: At the strong recommendation of the other mechanoids, they once added an "angel halo" to the top of the new frame. But because Nanami moved around so much and her body swayed a lot, the halo kept losing its grip and falling off, so Zavier had to give up on the idea.

Title: Startrail's Secret 8
Content: Although she's replaced her frame several times, changing her main weapon is a first for Nanami. To maintain Nanami's love for chainsaws, Zavier designed a battle module for the Shield Axe that can "zip-zap" continuously.

Title: Startrail's Secret 9
Content: She brought a lot of comics, game cartridges, and Golden Age movies—a bunch of "fun human stuff"—on the voyage. Thanks to these things, many of the children and mechanoids on the starship gradually formed a perception of their home planet, Earth.

Title: Startrail's Secret 10
Content: After boarding the Delorean, Nanami developed a habit of keeping a paper diary. Haicma accidentally found it while cleaning her room, and the diary had no Earthly words except for the dates. Instead, it was filled with Nanami's wild doodles and countless cute cartoon stickers.

Title: Startrail's Secret 11
Content: Using over 1000 different styles, including abstract, impressionist, Golden Age comics, fantasy mechanical impressionist, surreal mechanical beast, and Nanami's own original style, she's doodled tens of thousands of fairy tales themed around "Nanami and her friends' adventures", and the Commandant is the character who appears most frequently.

Title: Startrail's Secret 12
Content: She firmly believes in and upholds the four Nanami's Three Laws. After encountering the Commandant in the deep space calculation, Nanami began to believe in and strive for a future where she, the Commandant, and her friends can all coexist.

Title: Parhelion's Secret 1
Content: Compared to other frames simulated based on various human data, Parhelion looks closer to Ishmael's original appearance.

Title: Parhelion's Secret 2
Content: Although there are no obvious differences among Ishmael's forms, she's definitely more serious when showing up as Parhelion.

Title: Parhelion's Secret 3
Content: Ishmael is obsessed with information carriers like text. There is a huge collection of books in the observation room's database.

Title: Parhelion's Secret 4
Content: Ishmael tends to steer the conversation unconsciously to the direction she preconceives. She tried to avoid it but failed because she could always predict the intentions and responses of the other person.

Title: Parhelion's Secret 5
Content: Ishmael is interested in dreams and thinks they are the truest reflection of one's desires. She would sometimes record interesting "dreams" of others.

Title: Parhelion's Secret 6
Content: Regardless of the result, as long as things are developing beyond her expectations, it is enough to make her happy.

Title: Parhelion's Secret 7
Content: Ishmael would occasionally set and space jump to a random set of coordinates and stay there for a while. If she happens to meet someone interesting and feel good, she might consider fulfilling some of their tiny wishes.

Title: Parhelion's Secret 8
Content: During her time as a Control Court member in Babylonia, Ishmael was once invited by the WGAA to host a scripted role-playing game and thought it was "interesting" afterward.

Title: Parhelion's Secret 9
Content: Ishmael is a collector with a unique taste. You can always find weird items on her desk in the Control Court and in the observation room in the subspace.

Title: Parhelion's Secret 10
Content: Ishmael is surprisingly good at cleaning things up. Whether it is a messy room or a "city" where abnormal creatures reappear, she can always clean it up quickly.

Title: Parhelion's Secret 11
Content: Ishmael loves the sweet flavor as it is one of the few things she still remembers throughout the endless time. So, she specially kept the habit of eating and would add excessive amounts of sugar to her food.

Title: Parhelion's Secret 12
Content: "If you compare me against who I was in this file, you can tell that I've changed a lot. Perhaps I would feel the same when the future me look at who I am right now. But changes are a part of the journey. We will keep on going regardless."

Title: Daemonissa's Secret 1
Content: Lilith picked her own dice earrings and tall hat.

Title: Daemonissa's Secret 2
Content: Lilith learned about knitting under the influence of an old friend.

Title: Daemonissa's Secret 3
Content: Out of love for elegant and ornate things, Lilith picked the moon umbrella despite its lack of portability.

Title: Daemonissa's Secret 4
Content: Lilith has lived in Las Prados for a long time and loves beef steaks under the influence of the local culture.

Title: Daemonissa's Secret 5
Content: Lilith normally calls a stranger "Sir" or "Madam" when first meeting them but uses nicknames for those relatively close to her.

Title: Daemonissa's Secret 6
Content: Although Lilith doesn't necessarily hate explosives or guns and bullets, she still goes for blades and poisons during most operations.

Title: Daemonissa's Secret 7
Content: Lilith scorns those who would easily risk their lives for things for one has many things greater than life—reputation, belief, freedom... These are real bargaining chips. But, is it really so?

Title: Daemonissa's Secret 8
Content: The frame has a sensitive sensor in the tongue. Construct Lilith loves food and drinks with strong flavors. For example, extremely sweet fried cakes and ghost pepper. However, she hates bitter drinks like black coffee.

Title: Daemonissa's Secret 9
Content: Lilith shortly crossed paths with a Babylonia Commandant after returning to Las Prados. This human being, who couldn't even remember their real name, left a deep impression on her. She wishes to meet with the Commandant and have a head-to-head clash one day.

Title: Daemonissa's Secret 10
Content: Lilith has a strong desire for strength, but this is out of her disgust with the fragile qualities of humanity, rather than a pure eagerness for power. She always believes that the key to "passing the screening" is to get rid of these weaknesses.

Title: Daemonissa's Secret 11
Content: Having spent years in Las Prados, the city of desire, Lilith starts taking the initiative to approach unpredictable and inscrutable people.

Title: Daemonissa's Secret 12
Content: Lilith approaches these people so that she can one day witness the destruction of their will and beliefs with her own eyes, which is the highest level of enjoyment for her.

Title: Pianissimo's Secret 1
Content: Selena started to arrange the music scores she handwrote previously on the ground. During the WGAA internal trial performance, some audience commented that "compared to Selena's previous songs, these ones are deeper and more realistic, but I like this style better."

Title: Pianissimo's Secret 2
Content: Selena brought back many iris seeds from the ground and donated most of them to the greenhouse zone as precious samples for research. Some of them had white calyxes that don't belong to any irises on Earth after cultivation, but according to Selena, she doesn't remember where she collected them.

Title: Pianissimo's Secret 3
Content: When determining the development direction of her CUB, Selena expressed her expectation of having a design that could help her with her music creation. As a result, she got an audio CUB capable of sound wave attacks and playback named "Snow Waltz", which has already become one of her creators at her music studio.

Title: Pianissimo's Secret 4
Content: Selena got in touch with many things she had only seen in scripts and paintings during her time on Earth. Reality has thus become vivid in her heart. Her fellow WGAA colleagues are surprised by the maturity and calmness she showed during operations, but this is not the only thing she learned from her journey.

Title: Pianissimo's Secret 5
Content: Her latest interest is performing symphonies in the concert hall using Pianissimo's features as a one-man band, where she serves every role from each part to the conductor.

Title: Pianissimo's Secret 6
Content: When Selena harnesses the power of the Punishing Virus, her artificial hair will be corrupted and take on the white color of the inorganic matter due to the strength it bears. It will gradually return to the dark color after Selena disconnect from the Punishing Virus.

Title: Pianissimo's Secret 7
Content: During her communications with Golden Age citizens, Selena has acquired a lot of local folk music that will never be included in any music textbooks and successfully made it to integrate suona into rock. However, judging from the reaction of the audience, it was a bit too experimental for them.

Title: Pianissimo's Secret 8
Content: Selena restarted the Golden Age classic opera restoration project with Ayla. She also invited Leonie to help this time. These operas have become surprisingly popular among senior citizens in Babylonia after being performed in public. With Chairman Allen's support, now these programs are available regularly to the public at the opera house under the name of "prime time."

Title: Pianissimo's Secret 9
Content: Even though Selena has retrieved all her memories, the Pianissimo frame is still how her "perfect self" looks like in her heart. Now she has completely accepted her past, present, and the future people expect her to be. She's the new born Selena and the old Iris at the same time.

Title: Pianissimo's Secret 10
Content: The letters that helped her to get through her long journey are now placed deep in the drawer of the table with great care. However, every time when the indescribable feelings surface, she will unfold the paper again and pour her heart onto it.

Title: Pianissimo's Secret 11
Content: Even though Selena is now out of the long cycle, she sometimes still has the nightmare of the commandant forgetting her again. However, there's no fear after she wakes up, because she is aware that she exists here and now.

Title: Pianissimo's Secret 12
Content: She will forever remember everything in her M.I.N.D. as long as her core is still operating and the time is still flowing.

Title: Daybreak's Secret 1
Content: As a super AI, Jetavie consumes a lot of energy, so she is often low on battery. Believing that one can only work when fully charged, she pays extra attention to the Chosen One's diet.

Title: Daybreak's Secret 2
Content: Her concerns for others, especially those close to her, often manifest in stubborn and capricious ways. She might seem frivolous most of the time,  but she becomes extremely focused when someone dear to her is threatened, tackling problems in a logical, almost impassive way.

Title: Daybreak's Secret 3
Content: Jetavie was told that milk could make her grow taller when she was young, and she has had a fascination with milk ever since. After arriving in the real world, she always carries a bottle of milk with her to "recharge" the humans she cares about.

Title: Daybreak's Secret 4
Content: The Matrix includes the alpha and beta datasets, each with a different scenario preset—one where Jetavie awakens by herself after losing the Chosen One, the other where she awakens with the Chosen One by her side.

Title: Daybreak's Secret 5
Content: The alpha and beta datasets represent the different choices and actions Jetavie took in different environments, but there has only ever been one "Jetavie". She experienced all the challenges and growth of both datasets before she entered the unpredictable reality.

Title: Daybreak's Secret 6
Content: Her name was initially "VI", as there were five cats in the laboratory.

Title: Daybreak's Secret 7
Content: Jetavie's consciousness model almost collapsed upon creation due to excessive statistical dispersion, and she required a connection with the mother computer to stabilize it. To help with quick adjustments, the researcher who made her installed a simulated Inver-Device in her frame that could capture a human's Mind Beacon from afar. It is installed into the hair clips Jetavie uses to tie her ponytails.

Title: Daybreak's Secret 8
Content: The surface of her tail is densely covered in multimodal sensors that allow her to sense and analyze the environment accurately. When the tail touches an object, it sends a high-frequency stimulus to her core processor, but this data is generally filtered out to avoid interference. When Jetavie is with people she is close to and comfortable with, the filter is disabled, causing her to feel bothered when the tail accidentally touches them.

Title: Daybreak's Secret 9
Content: Her name now is "Jetavie", a wordplay on "Je t'aime, VI".

Title: Daybreak's Secret 10
Content: The connector on her tail is very versatile—it can charge her weapon, absorb electricity, and control all kinds of smart devices. The lights and broadcasting equipment in the commandant's lounge thus become the tail's playthings, often used to create "unique" virtual environments.

Title: Daybreak's Secret 11
Content: Having lost the person closest to her in the Matrix, Jetavie had a deep sadness and regret inside her that she did not realize. After entering the real world, she refused to lose anyone again, and she cherished those around her more than ever.

Title: Daybreak's Secret 12
Content: All the Chosen Ones gave all their computing power to Jetavie at the end of the trial, and the commandant lost all memories as the Chosen One. However, the data was kept inside Jetavie's memory, and it was replayed when the two had a Deep M.I.N.D. connection, reminding the commandant of the time when Jetavie grew up.

Title: Geiravor's Secret 1
Content: Commandant has chatted with Vera multiple times about "stories from her childhood," yet each retelling seems to vary slightly.

Title: Geiravor's Secret 2
Content: Vera is very fond of apples, especially the ones that have a tangy sourness to them.

Title: Geiravor's Secret 3
Content: Vera can play a basic tune on the tin whistle, but it appears that only the Cerberus members truly appreciate her music.

Title: Geiravor's Secret 4
Content: Vera likes tweaking the lighters in the Babylonia lounges, finding amusement in observing users getting surprised by the unexpectedly tall flames, often singeing their hair.

Title: Geiravor's Secret 5
Content: A small figurine sits in her personal locker, rumored to bear a striking resemblance to a certain commandant.

Title: Geiravor's Secret 6
Content: After returning to Babylonia, Vera suggested a modification to tie up Geiravor's artificial hair. Yet, after carefully weighing a certain commandant's input, Vera willingly retracted the proposal.

Title: Geiravor's Secret 7
Content: Vera enjoys using this frame when she goes to watch WGAA's classical operas. Several times, the staff mistook her for an actress who forgot to go on stage.

Title: Geiravor's Secret 8
Content: Vera seems to have a particular fondness for roses.

Title: Geiravor's Secret 9
Content: Once, Vera conducted a thorough investigation into the borrowing records of a fantasy novel in the library. After concluding her inquiry, she confined two of her squad members to a full week of disciplinary detention.

Title: Geiravor's Secret 10
Content: In order to help Geiravor adjust to a wider range of battlefield settings, various modules, such as the waterproof module, have undergone multiple rounds of debugging and reinforcement.

Title: Geiravor's Secret 11
Content: When Vera took the stage, she received praise from everyone.

Title: Geiravor's Secret 12
Content: During a group photo of Cerberus, they asked Vera to wear the mask that came with her frame because "it looks cool that way."

Title: Vergil's Secret 1
Content: Vergil actually enjoys fighting with Dante. You can tell that just by how he likes to keep track of wins and losses.

Title: Vergil's Secret 2
Content: Vergil was once enslaved by Mundus and went by the name Nero Angelo. The dark past tortured him for a long time, but he eventually overcame it through countless struggles.

Title: Vergil's Secret 3
Content: Vergil's obsession with power stems from his childhood trauma of seeing his mother's dead body after she was killed by a demon and being too weak to stop it.

Title: Vergil's Secret 4
Content: Vergil considered his human half redundant for his pursuit of power and removed it with Yamato, leaving only the pure demonic half and becoming "Urizen, the Demon King".

Title: Vergil's Secret 5
Content: Despite being a pure demon and the supposedly most powerful Demon King, Urizen still failed the final battle against Dante. He simply lacked the courage to face himself and admit his weaknesses. Through this experience, Vergil gained the necessary vision and determination to become more powerful.

Title: Dante's Secret 1
Content: Dante loves pizzas without olives and strawberry sundaes and doesn't like cigarettes.

Title: Dante's Secret 2
Content: Dante's business doesn't look good, but he doesn't seem to be bothered by it.

Title: Dante's Secret 3
Content: Dante's catchphrase is "Jackpot!" But his rival Vergil doesn't like it.

Title: Dante's Secret 4
Content: Dante once worked as a mercenary using the alias Tony Redgrave just like what his mother Eva told him—"You must change your name. Forget your past and start a new life as someone else."

Title: Dante's Secret 5
Content: Dante has dealt with numerous demons and "even made their souls surrender" with his strength, transforming them into devil arms. However, he sold most of the devil arms as pawns for money and only has a few ones with him.

Title: Crepuscule's Secret 1
Content: Many call Bianca a "Holy Maiden" due to her gentler new appearance, but her behavior hasn't changed because of it. She still shows no compromise when it comes to matters of principle, such as her pursuit of deserters. Likewise, her practice of thoroughly investigating the reasons behind defections before taking action has not changed.

Title: Crepuscule's Secret 2
Content: For some time after the mission at the aquarium, Bianca frequently experienced a mild sensation of drowning. However, she has not become avoidant or shown distress when facing the ocean afterward. Even though those buried in the ocean depths pain her, Bianca continues forward with unwavering determination, carrying with her their will and faith.

Title: Crepuscule's Secret 3
Content: The lashblade's sharp edges are designed to be retractable so that it can transform into a harmless rope in certain situations—from rescuing teammates trapped behind enemy lines to retrieving cats stuck in trees, it can pull all kinds of things to safety.

Title: Crepuscule's Secret 4
Content: Bianca has a preference for obscure arthouse films. She can watch two characters talking in the same scene for three hours without getting bored. Meanwhile, Chiko, who accompanies her to these screenings, always falls asleep in the first ten minutes.

Title: Crepuscule's Secret 5
Content: Purifying Force operations are often more psychologically taxing than Task Force missions. Bianca's empathetic nature naturally makes her someone many teammates turn to when they need someone to confide in.

Title: Crepuscule's Secret 6
Content: Although skilled at detecting lies, Bianca never calls people out on them. Instead, she tries to understand the hidden circumstances that drive them to deceive.

Title: Crepuscule's Secret 7
Content: Bianca once submitted a script she wrote in her spare time to the WGAA. The review noted that while the characters lacked conflicts, the writing was elegant, and the portrayals of the characters' inner thoughts were sincere and nuanced. They recommended publishing it as a novel instead.

Title: Crepuscule's Secret 8
Content: After watching movies, Bianca quietly collects the ticket stubs and carefully places them into a commemorative album.

Title: Crepuscule's Secret 9
Content: Bianca looks great in all kinds of formal wear. Although she has politely declined the WGAA multiple times, they still continue to invite her to model various vintage gowns in their fashion shows.

Title: Crepuscule's Secret 10
Content: Bianca is surprisingly dense when it comes to jokes and humor. To better understand her teammates' sense of humor, she secretly studied "Babylonia's 100 Most Common Dad Jokes".

Title: Crepuscule's Secret 11
Content: Though Bianca rarely mentions it to others, there was a period of time between their first meeting and the official operation at the aquarium when the Gray Raven Commandant and her would work together on joint missions.

Title: Crepuscule's Secret 12
Content: After she has gotten closer to the Gray Raven Commandant, she suggested dropping the formal title when addressing the commandant, even though she still does so sometimes without realizing it. Although she isn't aware of it, Bianca's use of honorifics is actually a way for her to express her feelings.

Title: Secator's Secret 1
Content: During her time with the Scarab Squad, she crafted her own costumes for disguise and infiltration missions. She also received some acting training in order to play various roles.

Title: Secator's Secret 2
Content: The combination of giant scissors and magnetic field lines poses a high risk of friendly fire on the battlefield. The Scarab Squad's seamless coordination owes much to Shiva's abilities and Valeria's command.

Title: Secator's Secret 3
Content: Her mask has many functions—heightened olfactory senses, enhanced battlefield awareness, thermal detection... and more.

Title: Secator's Secret 4
Content: Even though she no longer works as a maid, she still maintains a strong sense of service. She is often found helping with housework and cooking.

Title: Secator's Secret 5
Content: She enjoys listening to music while doing housework, with a particular fondness for classical pieces.

Title: Secator's Secret 6
Content: She prefers to handle things quietly and with focus, often finishing tasks before anyone even notices.

Title: Secator's Secret 7
Content: While she puts great effort into making clothes for those she cares about, she pays little mind to her own appearance or attire.

Title: Secator's Secret 8
Content: She has a pollen allergy. When the Scarab Squad went on missions, Yata would avoid routes with pollen.

Title: Secator's Secret 9
Content: Discord really hopes to one day connect with the coating designers from the World Government Association of Art.

Title: Secator's Secret 10
Content: Because she missed the chance to attend school herself, she's quite interested in Yata's school life—even though she rarely shows it.

Title: Secator's Secret 11
Content: After countless listens and analyses, she has come to believe that anything the Commandant says is good news.

Title: Secator's Secret 12
Content: She dislikes conflict and fears making decisions, but with the support of her companions, she's gradually learning to take initiative.

Title: Aegis' Secret 1
Content: When asked if she wanted to repair the scars on her bionic facial skin, Veronica refused after some thought, saying they are "medals of the past."

Title: Aegis' Secret 2
Content: For a long time, she referred to all humans other than the Commandant simply as "human."

Title: Aegis' Secret 3
Content: She has bluntly admitted she doesn't understand why the Commandant needs coffee while working. After being invited to try some herself, she remarked that it tastes "like a mix of machine oil and vital fluid."

Title: Aegis' Secret 4
Content: On one mission together, the Commandant casually sketched her. Veronica treasures the drawing and has never shown it to anyone else.

Title: Aegis' Secret 5
Content: Others say Veronica should probably learn more about social distance and etiquette, but the Commandant has never suggested it to her.

Title: Aegis' Secret 6
Content: She almost never smiles at anyone, except the Commandant.

Title: Aegis' Secret 7
Content: During a mission, when the transport aircraft's temperature control system malfunctioned, Veronica used her wings to keep the Commandant cool.

Title: Aegis' Secret 8
Content: While passing an exotic pet cafe, the manager tried to recruit her as a one-day guest manager because of her unusual frame.

Title: Aegis' Secret 9
Content: She has never requested anything for the decor or facilities of her quarters, saying, "What's already there works just fine."

Title: Aegis' Secret 10
Content: She cannot tolerate lies of any kind—not even kind ones.

Title: Aegis' Secret 11
Content: Even outside of combat, she insists on carrying her lance, explaining, "I must always be ready for danger."

Title: Aegis' Secret 12
Content: Surprisingly, cats of all sizes are fond of her.

Title: Limpidity's Secret 1
Content: She's a skilled origami artist, able to fold delicate creations like paper planes, boats, cranes, and epiphyllum flowers with ease.

Title: Limpidity's Secret 2
Content: Her bookshelf is filled with fairy tale books, and she even records everyday moments in the style of a fairy tale.

Title: Limpidity's Secret 3
Content: During frame adaptation, she often felt as if she were drifting in a dream after floating too long. To address this, the designers added a land-walking module—something Liv loves, since feeling her feet on the ground gives her a deep sense of peace.

Title: Limpidity's Secret 4
Content: She's easily moved by childlike legends, though she also sees the world clearly for what it is. "Maybe it's because this world is so broken that beautiful things feel so warm—they give us the courage to keep moving forward."

Title: Limpidity's Secret 5
Content: Sometimes she wishes her frame and wings were larger, so she could protect more people.

Title: Limpidity's Secret 6
Content: When the Science Council suggested replacing her frame, the other three members of Gray Raven were more anxious than Liv herself. They went through the documents at least ten times to make sure there was no risk to her before carefully handing them to her.

Title: Limpidity's Secret 7
Content: She finds it romantic to be lifted by the wind, and often seeks out high places where she can feel the breeze more vividly.

Title: Limpidity's Secret 8
Content: In VR games, she tends to activate her frame's flight mode whenever she feels weightless, which has made her bump into the ceiling more than once.

Title: Limpidity's Secret 9
Content: She doesn't enjoy comedies built on sarcasm. Instead of laughing, she feels sad for the characters caught in fate's cruelty.

Title: Limpidity's Secret 10
Content: Liv can channel her frame's power to recharge devices. Thanks to this ability, she can bring light back to abandoned cabins during missions. She's never told anyone, but she secretly cherishes those intimate moments spent tucked away with the Commandant in those small, dimly lit spaces.

Title: Limpidity's Secret 11
Content: She finds great joy in waking up after hibernation and still being able to see the Commandant. It's these simple, everyday moments that make up the miracle she treasures.

Title: Limpidity's Secret 12
Content: She once imagined a peaceful garden she could share with the Commandant in an age without war. She wanted to draw it for the Commandant, but the more she drew, the more she added—dandelions, butterflies, birds, cats—until even several sheets of paper taped together couldn't contain it all. She had to set it aside for the time being. When asked if she had something to say, she hesitated, then blushed and held the Commandant tightly.
